Her foot wasn't that bad since you were not that terribly small but then you were faces with a decision you can either play it safe and go inside the fluff and have an easier climb since you already knew how safe is in there when she brought you to her home or respect her privacy and climb outside the fluff
1313111111.title: Put you down by her feet and motions to climb h...

13132.content: What about a midnight Lycanroc?
13132.title: Rock dog

131321.content: Midday, Midnight or Dusk form?
131321.title: Lycanroc

1313212.content:
Standing on the rock, you recognize the Pokemon from before, it's a Midnight Lycanroc. Its red velvet coating with its white underbelly glisten under the sunset. Its red glowing eyes watching you without motion and its toothy grin makes you unnerved to not move or even speak. Looking at more of its body, you notice a slit in between the hips of the Lycanroc, confirming the gender to be a female. You try and say something to it, when the winds of the mountain hit you, tearing every inch of warmth away from your body, leaving you with nothing.

"C-c-can you help me..." You plead to the big Lycanroc, shivering on the rock's surface. Fortunately, your pleads are answered, as a giant white paw snatches you off of the cold boulder. The claws grip is soon replaced with the Lycanroc's chest fur, as she presses you onto it, keeping you warm. You dig your head into the fur, feeling how surprisingly soft it feels, when you feel the motion of the Lycanroc starting to move. You look up to see a glimpse of the Lycanroc's head. Though she's still smiling, she doesn't seem to be looking at you at the present moment. With all that happened in one day, what with you shrinking, being found by a giant Lycanroc, and almost freezing to death, you take no time at all to fall asleep in the Lycanroc's fur.
-

Waking up, you almost immediately see the Lycanroc's face looking directly at you with her head to the floor, with a less toothier smile, but still smiling. The second thing you notice is that you are in a cave. Though still cold, it's not as bad as it was before, and especially with the Lycanroc's breath blasting over you. You slowly get up and face the Lycanroc, as she lifts her head to reveal the rest of her body sitting down.

"Thank you for saving me." You say, as the Lycanroc responds with...
1313212.title: Midnight Doggo

132.content:
Your heart nearly stopped, and your blood seemed to freeze within your veins.

In front of you, staring at you, was no normal pokemon (which would have made a certain impression anyway, due you being incredibly small).

No, this wasn't the fellow Pidgey or Rattata you could have met in the woods, this was nothing less than a legendary!

And it was staring down at you, jaw hanging open as it processed the fact that it was staring at what couldn't be a really weird-looking bug, but a shrunken human!

As your mind began pondering all the possible, disastrous scenarios that would have occurred if you made the incredibly dumb mistake of angering this titan in any way, you struggled to remember its name.

The gigantic creature in front of you didn't move, but kept its eyes fixed on you, blinking incredulously while its warm breath blew past you, though doing nothing to help the chills that traveled down your spine, though not because of the cold, but because you were understandably afraid.

And finally, when the creature reached out for you, you remembered what legendary it was.
132.title: Meeting a legend

choices: Pretend to be under her spell a little longer and act docile.
Mew makes a move before you can act.
1321.content:
The shimmering oceanic blue where you had first witnessed your own reflection give off an expression of confusion and terror had given you the initial impression that this was Azelf, Phione or some other blue legendary seen through your now distorted world view. Eventually your higher mental functions came alive and told you that this had only been its eyes.

Still, your mind found it difficult to process what you were witnessing. This elusive creature had been known to strike awe into the most hardened men when seen at a distance, and now you were taking it all in so close and larger than life. The most troubling aspect was the color of this creature. It was pink; you understood that much. But it was no shade you had ever seen before. It was not covered by skin. It was not covered by hair. It was simply an unnaturally clean and bright pink, almost like a cartoon character come to life. One would have to be blind, deaf and dumb to miss that this was not a regular Pokémon.

It was Mew. Stunned to an almost religious degree, you did nothing as the legendary's hand grasped your sides and lifted you up in the air.

"Hello, human," the Mew spoke with a sweet voice, not sounding too loud but covering you in further its non-descript breath, "You must be very startled by my apperance, but if you remain calm then all will be fine. Do you understand?"

You didn't, but you found your head nodding up and down anyway. A suggestion crept through your mind that all was fine, there was nothing to worry about, just admire the view and take it easy...

The sweet little Mew placed you back down on your old clothes and then proceeded to rummage through your belongings. This was fine. Nothing to worry about. You took the opportunity to the admire the view of the legendary's unremarkable backside, with its long tail waving back and forth in excitement. How lucky you were! Instead of trudging through the night like a putz, you got to meet up with Mew! You couldn't wait to tell everyone at the bar about this! You decided to take in every feature so you could explain this in as much detail as possible. Mew picked up a a bag of snacks that you had brought and smiled, placing it beside its unremarkable backside. Its unremarkable backside covered your view as the Mew went on and you began to make a mental note on its unremarkable backside and the rest of its far more interesting body, starting with its unremarkable backside. Its? Uremarkable? Backside...

The first feeling of something being amiss crept up your spine. You had always considered legendaries to be genderless, and like most others you had never been able to confirm this theory with hands-on experience. That was until now, and there was no denying that this Mew was female. For with her backside in view, there was a view that had seemed unremarkable before but now appeared to be the most interesting aspect of this creature. Mew's tail shone. Mew's hind legs shone. But Mew's vagina was as common and predictable as they come.

Your eyes remained glued to Mew's womanhood as her butt waved back and forth and your cognition slowly began to kick into gear again. Suddenly your brain was suggesting that this sweet little Mew was a, in fact, a gigantic creature that whose tail's invoulentary twitch would be enough to send you flying whatever qualified as miles at this size. As logic follows, this would suggest that this situation was not alright at all! The only view you were "admiring" right now was of the callous legendary stealing your shit!

Mew hummed cheerfully to herself as she ran inventory on her haul. This was the best idea ever! Why fight a trainer's six Pokémon and risk capture when you could just shrink them from behind? A little psychic suggestion to keep them from freaking out and she was free to take whatever she wanted! Food, snacks, bottles of who-knows-what; even those interesting human gadgets appealed to her, though she handled them with care as to not get swept into a Master Ball by mistake. She hadn't made it this long by being careless.

You look up at the giant smirking to herself and get ready to do something about it when suddenly your body enters shock. You sieze up and fall to the side, an unimagiable cold crushing your body from all sides. It felt like being frozen in ice and you remembered your earlier concerns about hypothermia. But this was worse than anything you could've ever imagined! You couldn't even move! Wheezing and gasping your last breaths, you attempt to cry for help. To someone. Anyone.

"There! Thank you for y-" Mew started as she turned around, seeing the human now dying on his old clothes. Her mind racing in panic, she quickly scooped up his tiny little body and examined it closer.

The entire world wooshed by as you narrowly escaped the jaws of death. In an instant your body thawed out, and you noticed the non-descript scent of Mew's breath like a wind of life. Heat radiated from the ground, and you felt your body tickled by very fine hairs; thin even at your size. And above you was Mew's gigantic face, her massive eyes staring at you.

Conflicting thoughts arose within Mew. Observing the naked man, it appeared that his metabolic system was designed to dissipate heat through the surface of his skin. Now that he was so much smaller, his body couldn't compensate and he would most likely freeze to death. If it wasn't for the heat coming form her body, he would already be dead. This was not what she had planned.

You tremble, both out of fear and residual cold. Mew was staring at you, but it was impossible to tell her intentions. Nothing about the way someone walks can tell you where they're going. She is capable of speech however, so you consider the option of talking your way out of this. You decide on how to go about your persuation attempt...
1321.title: Under the spell of Mew

choices: You couldn't survive out there! You decided to stick with the Mew, for now...
This legendary almost got you killed, no way you were sticking with her!
Too late! The Mew was waking up!
13211.content:
Even though the Mew's bodily heat offered a feeble shield from the jaws of cold that were slowly closing around you, it wasn't enough to keep you from shivering, or to keep your teeth from chattering.

Your gaze shifted from the wall of pink, thin fur in front of you to the giantess that currently held you.

You discovered the Mew busily picking up the stuff she had taken from your bag with Psychic, before turning around to get away.

Only to immediately stop to turn around again and pick up the human's abandoned shirt as well.

Then, hastily, she darted off, deeper into the thick woods. She briefly looked at her human victim, and the sight alone was enough to strike guilt into her: he looked like he was almost frozen (as he was certainly going to be if she didn't hurry), his eyes were completely void, his teeth chattering, producing a low sound that only made the legendary increase her speed.

With your brain rapidly shutting down, you looked at the very agitated legendary that was carrying you to an unknown destination, floating at full speed through the forest with the stuff she stole hovering behind her.

She wasn't looking at you and, for a moment, you thought about shouting to get her attention, demand her to let you go, appear as imposing as possible right now.

But you decided against it; an angry legendary was the last thing you needed right now and, to tell the truth, you didn't feel like you had any more strength to shout. The wise thing to do was to keep calm, pretend to be still under the Mew's spell and ask questions when you weren't about to die in her paws.

Once again, you saw her gigantic blue eyes gazing down at you as she checked if you were still alive.

You made eye contact with the Mew.

"W-Whe-" you started, but trailed off as cold penetrated your mouth, invading your insides as well.

"Save your strength human, you'll need it," the pink giantess said, concerned,
"Don't worry, all will be fine. Just stay calm..."

You couldn't conceive how she was asking you to ‘stay calm’ right now. If you weren't about to enter hypothermia and shrunken to a pitifully small size, you would have certainly freaked out.

Your train of thought was interrupted, and you felt like your brain was frozen, like you had just eaten a lot of ice cream too hastily. Each thought now hurt your head, the unrelenting cold stung you from all sides.

And your consciousness slowly waned. You took one last glance at the gigantic Mew, before everything became dark as you passed out from the cold.

As for Mew, she finally made it to a small cave and rushed inside, finally finding shelter from the grip of cold.

Not for her, of course. Her fur kept her perfectly warm.

It was for the human she had shrunken.

Sure, fighting trainers and their pokemon bothered her, but she never came even close to killing anyone! She never even thought about such thing!

Feeling bad, the legendary set the stuff she took - stole - on the stone floor of the cavern, before she finally looked at her tiny passenger.

She felt like she punched in the stomach, her eyes shrunk at the sight of the naked human laying motionless against her chest, his eyes closed and his mouth gaping open.

Crap.

Hastily, the pink legendary brought her head on top of your form and listened carefully in complete silence.

...

Thankfully, the human was still alive. But it didn't mean he was out of danger.

Hastily, Mew began rubbing you in between her paws while she neared her mouth to you and breathed right on your body.

Only after several moments she stopped and picked up your shirt with Psychic, wrapping you up in one of the sleeve.

It seemed like her actions weren't in vain, she thought with a sigh of relief, the human's face regained a little bit of color.

You were safe.

--

‘Am I... dead...?’

This was your first thought as you woke up, slowly opening your eyes to glance around.

Everything was comprehensibly blurry, but your vision cleared after a few instants, allowing you to see... nothing.

Everything was pitch black.

"W-Wha-"

Memories of what happened began returning: you met Mew, you saw her stealing your stuff, you... almost died from the cold, if you weren't dead for real right now.

...

You felt your hand and tried to pinch yourself with it, but you discovered that you couldn't move.

In confusion you looked around, which took a bit of an effort.

Laying there, right in front of you, was the giant form of the Mew you met before.

Your first instinct was to back away, but you couldn't move properly.

But you relaxed upon realizing the the giantess was asleep, her eyes closed and her breath slow, rhythmic, almost hypnotic. Even when asleep, the legendary was absolutely fascinating, but you didn't have any time to think about her now.

You looked at yourself, discovering that the reason of your immobility was your own shirt, wrapped tightly around you.

Mew must have improvised this blanket for you to warm you up, you sourly thought.

You struggled to break free from your own shirt, feeling like you were going to suffocate, but you only managed to loosen it up a bit. Better than nothing though.

Once again, your gaze went to the sleeping Mew.

If you managed to break free completely, you could get away from this unpredictable legendary that almost caused your death only to steal a few things from your bag - she even brought them along while she rescued you!

... But, she saved you, so that meant she didn't mean you any real harm, and your chances alone out there were quite low.

Mew seemed like a comforting thought, a barrier around you, but she also was a tormenting thought; if you stayed around her, she could do all sorts of things to you and you wouldn't have been able to stop her.

The thought alone was terrifying, but not as much as it was the mental image of your dead body in the middle of these woods you made the mistake in coming to.

Whatever you were going to do, you had to make a choice, fast.

Mew wasn't going to sleep forever.
13211.title: Rescued, but still unsafe

choices: Keep calm and try to talk your way out of this. Perhaps it'll work...
Enough with this! Demand she grew you back right away!
132113.content:
Before you could make your decision, you saw the pink giantess beside you starting to fidget in her sleep; her breath slowed down, her eyelids began trembling.

She was waking up!

Just a second before the Mew's sapphire eyes opened, you remembered about your previous plan and adopted a vaguely confused expression, like you had just been hypnotized.

Immediately, the pink legendary looked down at the tiny human she preyed on earlier.

Seeing you awake filled her with relief - you weren't dead.

You remained silent, waiting for the mythical pokemon to make the first move.

"Hey... little human. How are you feeling?" she asked with concern.

"Fine..." you simply replied in a whisper.

Mew nodded.

"Listen, you probably already know this, but things got a bit harsh back there and you passed out from cold," she unnecessarily explained, since the memory of all the cold penetrating your skin like thousands minuscule pins was enough to make you shiver.

Your being naked didn't really help with the feeling right now.

Still, you did your best to act like this all was nothing more but a dream.

Mew looked ashamed of herself.

"I... brought you here, I tried to warm you up a bit." she felt a painful knot around her stomach.
"I must apologize to you, human." she nervously added as she shifted.

Before your eyes, the giantess sat upright in front you, inadvertently giving you a clear view of her vagina.

You did your best to not blush.

"For what...?" you asked instead.

Mew sighed deeply as she fidgeted in place nervously; her tail wagged behind her and her fingertips connected.

"You see, there is a reason to your current predicament..." she began, her heart pounding faster with each word she spoke.

This piqued your interest. So this Mew knew what was going on? Did she knew a way to fix your problem?

"Uh..." you moaned vaguely, acting like your brain was severely injured. You didn't care if you appeared like a dumb Slakoth, you had to remain calm.

Mew blinked, surprised by this human's self-control.

She inhaled deeply - his self-control was going to shatter like an ice sculpture, she was sure of it.

"I'm the one that shrunk you." she admitted with a blush.

Against her predictions, the human remained still, with the same expression on the face.

His eyes widened a bit though.

You felt like deprived of energy.

Mew didn't know the cause of your shrinking, Mew was the cause of your shrinking!

All pieces suddenly went to place: you wander around the forest when you feel dizzy, probably because of a psychic-type move like Hypnosis; you fall asleep and ‘mysteriously’ shrink down. And when you wake up, you find the legendary Mew right behind you, ready to steal your stuff!

This was crazy!

Only one thing was still hazy for you though - why did the Mew rescue you if all she wanted was your stuff? It would have been even easier to take your stuff if you were disposed of by the cold...

Perhaps this legendary DID have a heart.

If you could talk to her properly, you could maybe convince her to just grow you back and let you go on your way with the promise you were going to forget everything that has been going on between you and her.

However, noticing your lack of response, Mew spoke up again.

"But don't worry! Everything will be fine, little human," she spoke reassuringly.

Finally, a cheerful smile appeared on her pink face.

"I am going to keep you safe, human, you don't have to worry about anything. You'll be warm and fed as long as you're with me."

You felt your heart sinking.

After shrinking you, carelessly exposing you to the cold that almost got you killed, this crazy legendary was kidnapping and keeping you like a common pet!

Your mind raced and your heart pounded as your calm began to wane, though your expression didn't change.

Something told you that, if you lost your cool, you were going to live to regret it for a couple minutes before being exterminated like a bug by the towering legendary.

You were seething right now, but you had to keep calm. An easy task.

You had to keep calm...
132113.title: Face-to-eye with Mew

choices: "I mean...I don't know how to grow you. All I can do is shrink things."
"I can't let you go after all of this, you might tell."
"What I mean is...I can't grow you yet."
1321131.content:
You tried to control your breathing as the cold was still seeping into you, and your rage was building. You closed your eyes and counted to 10 before responding to her.

"I appreciate that...you didn't leave me out there to die." You started with, trying to keep an even tone. "If not for you I would've frozen to death." You said, leaving the part out where she was the reason you were experiencing this in the first place.

She looked at you, shivering in your sleeve and gave a small smile to you before lifting you out of the sleeve, undoing what you couldn't have broken free from like it was nothing to her. Soon you were in her paws, her body heat permeating through you as she hugged you to her chest, instantly bringing a soothing warmth to your whole body. The wall of pink felt soft and you almost felt like drifting off again right there...

"You poor thing...don't worry, i'll keep you nice and warm." She said, trying to comfort you...it felt degrading, like she was patronizing you, and you still had the anger boiling near the surface. She did this and jacked your shit!

"I...really need to go home Mew." You said and she looked down at you, her face looming as her eyes looked a bit perplexed.

"Pardon?" She said as she tilted her head.

"You...shrunk me, and you decided to keep me warm and alive after the fact, but can't you just...grow me back and send me on my way?" You asked, hoping that you'd be able to convince her.

She shook her head no to you, filling you with dread.

"Listen little human, you don't need to fret, this is your home now, with me. Just forget about the growing back thing." She said and your heart sank as you did your best to control your emotions, it was getting harder.

"Why...can't you grow me and I agree to not speak of you? Please Mew...I really need to get back to town."

She shook her head once again.

"I cannot grow you back." She said in a firmer tone, basically telling you not to ask again. This time following up with a reason.
1321131.title: Keeping calm

choices: "I'm sorry... there's really nothing I can do..." Mew spoke sorrowfully
"Well..." Mew began, "I could try to figure how to grow you back..."
"Perhaps I know someone that could help you..." Mew said
13211311.content:
Before your incredulous eyes, the giant Mew adopted a deep shade of red, which spread across her cheeks as she looked away.

In response to your pleading gaze, she only mumbled something incomprehensible.

"W-What...?" you asked, though something in your mind told you that you really didn't want to know, like a feeling that whatever the Mew just said was nothing but bad news for you.

The pink giantess closed her eyes and sighed deeply, her tail waving back and forth in a nervous fashion.

"I said..." she paused to inhale once more,
"I have no idea how to grow you back."

For several minutes, a deafening silence fell all over the place like mist.

Your heart had frozen. Your blood had frozen. Your brain and mouth had frozen.

What did that mean?

It seemed a simple concept, but you couldn't wrap your mind around it, no, you didn't want to accept it!

"What does that mean?" you asked, starting to lose the cool you kept so far,
"Why can't you grow me back?"

Mew seemed to feel your sudden change of tone, which made her cringe.

For several moments, she didn't reply.

But then, she slowly turned her head to face you.

"I mean... I simply don't know. I only know how to shrink things... or you humans, if you prefer." she explained,
"Haven't quite figured the growing part out yet..."

Each sentence felt like a knife stabbing you directly in the heart.

Mew was basically saying that you were doomed to live as a shrunken human, a doll in the paws of this crazy legendary who just ruined your life!

"But," you insisted,
"There ought to be a way to grow me back... there must be, no? If you were able to shrink me, there has to be something that can grow me back to my height!"

That was it, you thought. A move, an ability, anything was acceptable if it meant that you could have your size back!

You looked at Mew intently, waiting for any kind of answer.

But all the pink legendary did was offer a shrug and sorrowful look.

"If there is a way to grow you back, I do not know." she bluntly stated,
"I'm sorry."

You stared at the giantess in silence for several seconds. The words she spoke, you knew, represented your sentence.

A life in this miserable size, in constant danger, lost in the middle of a forest, stuck with the unpredictable legendary.

Your legs stiffened as you laid there before the towering Mew, desperation taking over your mind and the need to cry growing stronger.

You fought back tears.

You may have lost your size and your life, but you still had your dignity... you weren't sure how that was going to last, given how you were naked and on the verge of tears.

You felt your body unable to move, and you didn't care.

Beside you, the pink pokemon that did this to you adopted a dejected look.

"I'm sorry, but-" she started, reaching out for you with a short paw.

You saw it coming your way.

A newfound adrenaline spread through your body like an electric shock, and you moved out of the way, leading the Mew to shoot you a perplexed stare.

Your desperation quickly waned from your mind, replaced by rage.

"You!" you shouted,
"You did this to me! You knew you couldn't grow me back, but you did it regardless! Just what did I do to you to deserve all of this!?"

A feeble voice in your mind reasonably told you to calm down, because an outburst was probably going to end with the Mew crushing your body into dust with the mere blink of an eye; however, you shut the voice up, telling yourself that living like this wasn't worth it.

Might as well take out all your repressed rage, you thought.

As for Mew, she looked taken aback.

Some legendaries had the power to feel others' emotions. The pink legendary wasn't among them, but could however feel an incredible amount of rage coming from you, and it was enough to scare her.

If this human didn't calm down, she'd have to use drastic measures and get him to calm down, whether he wanted or not.

"... You did nothing to me," she calmly began.

Her calm only made you feel more angry, why the hell did she seem to not care about your predicament.

"Then why the hell did you this to me!? I was just wandering around, did I, I don't know, step in your turf or something?" you exclaimed,
"You literally ruined my life! What am I going to do now!?"

Mew frowned, feeling guilty.

She meant you no actual harm, but your words were true.

If she couldn't grow you back, then an innocent's life was ruined for no reason.

"Please, just calm down," she muttered,
"We can talk this over..."

By this point, you felt like you were about to catch fire, your anger threatening to blow your head up at any time.

"Calm down!? Calm down!? You just ruined my life and all you can say is-" you were interrupted as the pink giantess suddenly
placed a paw on your forehead, with enough strength to send you stumbling back and fall down on the stone floor.

Before you had any time to react, the paw on your forehead sent a pink glow spreading through your body.

You tried to protest, but you felt your anger waning all of a sudden as Mew performed Heal Pulse.

After a few seconds, the legendary pulled back, staring down at you with a tired expression.

"There. This should make you more reasonable." she said as she sat back down, letting out a long sigh.

You blinked, all your rage disappeared from your mind as you sat up.

"So this is it..." you muttered dejectedly, reverting back to desperation,
"There is... there is really no way for me to grow back...?"

Mew seemed deep in thought.

Once again, silence fell all over the cave, and remained unbroken for a good while, in which nothing was said or done from both you or Mew.

Ultimately though, the legendary looked back at you and finally broke the silence,
13211311.title: Two big problems

choices: ... lean back and let him continue?
... stop him and try to clear things up?
132113112.content:
"Wh... Really?" you replied with surprise, a ray of hope shining through you heart.

"Of course!" Mew spoke up with a cheerful disposition, "I mean, there's nothing a Mew can't do!"

"Oh," you say, trying to remember if you had picked up any TMs or HMs with Growth lately, "Do you mean that in, like, an inspirational way or something more concrete?"

"No no no, don't worry!" Mew giggles while waving her relatively small yet to you gargantuan paws back and forth, "Shrinking and growing things are a Mew's specialty! I'm just a newbie at it, it's not like I had a trainer to teach me how to..."

The wind pressure from her gesture stirred up the cool night's air and caused it to strike against your tiny body, which screamed out for a source of heat.

"M-MEW!" you shouted between the shivers, "Stop... Doing things. I-It's very..."

"Oh! Sorry," she said as she picked you up and you felt the pink fuzz lightly crush you. It wasn't a lukewarm sensation, but more like heat cleashing with cold, like lighting a fire while naked in a blizzard. It wasn't enough, and you worried that you were going to pass out again.

"Mew, I'm still cold!" you said and tried to rub your temple, but your arms were pinned to your sides by the giantess. Without wasting a moment, mew leaned back and dropped you on top of her stomach, before holding her paws over you like a shelter.

"Better?" Mew asked cautiously before quietly giggling, "I'm not putting you in my mouth."

"I wasn't asking you to," you say, feeling satisfactory amounts of warmth wash over your body. From this perspective, everything looked so strange. Underneath you was a field of pink grass, which was warm to the touch constantly rippling with pulse-like movement and noise. Above you were two giant hands, blocking out most of the light and trapping the heat like inside a greenhouse. And through a small crack in front of you, though the yawning portal to another world from your point of view, was the beaming face of Mew, the giantess you were now sitting on. You were on the belly of a tiny little legendary, one so small you could probably have held her in one hand normally. Now she was your entire world.

"How did this happen...?" you uttered breathlessly, taking in what it must feel like to be an ant, "... Specialists in shrinking? I've never heard anything about that."

Mew stares at you for a few moments as she appears to ponder something.

"How old are you?" she asked flatly, her hot breath blowing inside your little hideout and adding to the sauna-like atmosphere. You hastily looked at the rating for the interactive story

"Eighteen plu... I mean, what that's got to do with it?" you ask. Mew stares at you a little longer this time; a little more intently.

"As you can see, I am not a particularly large Pokémon," she explained with a calm tone, and her words stung a bit.

"Could've fooled me..." you muttered bitterly, leaning back on the immesurably huge belly of this "not particularly large" Pokémon, "So you shrunk yourself down to this size?"

"No silly; I shrink others!" Mew giggled as she looked off to the side sheepishly, "And then grow them back, of course, but the shrinking part just kind of came to me naturally and the growing bit... And I wasn't supposed to shrink you THAT much either... Hmm..."

"What the..." you stammer in disbelief, wondering if all Pokémon were this crazy once you got to know them better, Why do you shrink people?"

"Oh, y'know," Mew chimed with a knowing grin. You didn't. You stare blankly at her, apparently enough for it to become uncomfortable as she cleared her throat, causing the chest in front of you to boom with a terrifying noise.

"... Have sex?" Mew said. You looked up at the giantess, somehow having forgotten that this planetoid you were on also came equipped with reproductive organs.

"Oh. Oooooh," you exclaim with the kind of knowing noise people feel the need to make whenever they've just figured something out, and then you became aware of a nagging feeling in the back of your head, "Wait, were you... Trying to... Court me?"

"What? No!" Mew shouted out in embarassment as she shook her head, "I was trying to... To..."

Steal your stuff, Mew thought to herself. But bringing that up now probably wasn't a good idea. Besides, all the talk about sex and having a naked guy pressed against her body had gotten her a little bit aroused. It wasn't just that though. There was something about the human's tiny form that made her heart race and face blush, filling her mind with ideas of a very different part of her body she'd like to put him. But all that was moot; she was trying to help him, not accidentally crush him.

"I was just... Experimenting, OK?" she said. The words left her mouth before she could stop herself as you crossed your arms, "That came out wrong. Listen..."

"Do you normally turn people into ants to have sex with them?" you continue asking, getting a surprising amount of satisfaction out of seeing this behemoth completely flustered. You thought you could see a blush spreading over her vast expression, though what little light you had to work with was constantly shifting around as her paws began to shake.

"Never!" Mew exclaimed as her eyes shot wide open, hoping she could explain this in a more 'normal' way than what she herself was feeling, "You're supposed to shrink them down just a little, y'know, so it... Fits properly?"

"Well, I'm honored, but I'm afraid I must decline," you said and stood up on the wobbly ground and turned away from her face, hoping to hide an amused smile from the living goddess, "At this size I think I'll fit with room to spare, if you catch my drift."

"That's true! So why would I shrink you down if I was trying to have sex with you!?" Mew argued as she raised herself a little, watching the small human tumble forward and faceplant straight into her fur. It felt odd to her; humans are built to walk upright and so most of their gravity gets focused into one spot. With the little guy outstretched like this she could barely even feel him, and she realized how insanely tiny she had made him. It made her heart flutter again.

"Because you screwed up!" the human shouted with exasperation and dug into the pink reed under him. This time Mew's heart wasn't fluttering; it was stopping. She opened her mouth to say something, but fell silent and felt embarassed. She would have a hard time arguing against that. She wasn't thinking about the consequences, and figured the human could've just wandered off and maybe grown himself back. She didn't think he was going to turn into a popsicle after 10 seconds. No matter how you looked at it, she was at fault here, and the human had every right to hate her as much as he did. There was no love in the air tonight.

Getting back on your feet, you watch Mew's gaze shift away from you. With those large sapphire eyes and soft features, there was something very cute about seeing a humongous creature get this bothered over an insignificant bug like him. If he were a fly on the wall he probably would've found it hilarious.

So she wanted to have sex with you? That was a shocker. You had always snarked at people talking about their 'magical' Pokémon journey, but you go hiking for just a few days and some demigoddess already wants you. You always liked Pokémon even if you had never thought about them in THAT way, but this Mew wasn't just any regular Pokémon. She could talk, for one. And she was nice and pretty funny too; all attractive features. And you would be lying if you said you weren't a bit curious.

"Hey," you said, causing the massive legendary to flinch and making your surroundings twitch.

"I'll do it," you stated bluntly. The sheer enormity of it all hit you as the giantess looked down at you, causing everything to change at once. Her breath came in once more like a summer's rainstorm and filled the air with humidity. Her heart hammered away inside her chest as the ground shook like an earthquake. Somewhere you recognized that this was complete insanity and would get even worse if you kept going down this path, but you had made up your mind - You were going to go through with this.

"Do what?" Mew asked with curiosity as she saw you turn and walk away from her. Or as close to it as he could manage, what with being on top of her body. Was he trying to leave?

"What do you think?" he replied sternly and kept going. He was leaving! Mew wanted to stop him, to hug him closer, but couldn't muster the heart to do. He really did hate her.

"You'll freeze," Mew wishpered sadly as she lifted her paws that were now blocking your way, and you could see the vast expanse of pink stretching out in front of you.

"Not for long," you responded, gulping loudly as you looked at the horizon. By now Mew was beginning to put two and two together, and realized that you walking to her shins for an easy jumping-off point was, in fact, you walking on a straight course towards her genitals.

"Wait! Wait!" Mew suddenly exclaimed as she almost sprang up, but stopped herself in the last moment as to keep you from tumbling off her completely, "I didn't mean for you to..."

"You'll keep me 'nice and warm', you said. I'm not an idiot," you recalled as you began to pick up your pace, the grassy fur around you receding into the "soil" the further you got and giving way to sleek pink skin. Mew was torn on what to do. On the one hand, this was a just a big misunderstanding! But on the other hand, her mind was swimming with plesurable feelings and the human didn't seem to mind the proposition she had been too afraid to ask. Does she...
132113112.title: "Well..." Mew began, "I could try t...

1321131121.content:
Ultimately, the blushing pink legendary found herself leaning back, drove by her inner desires; her mind tried to snap out of the trance she found herself in, but her will was weak compared to the lust that was rising in her, causing her whole body to burn hot.

She watched you, her shrunken casualty, walk down, moving from her tummy to the opening of her reproductive system.

'Don't let him...' a feeble voice in her mind spoke, but was soon silenced as Mew's lucidity began to wane, replaced by lost.

Now, all she was thinking about was you; her mistake, your condition, the guilt she had felt shortly ago, it all disappeared from her mind, replaced by lustful scenarios of the human-

You stood on the very top of the pink giantess' nether lips, hesitating; beneath you was like a giant chasm which awaited your entrance; you could feel the blood pumping beneath your feet, causing a tickling sensation through your bare soles.

You bent down, sliding a hand along Mew's fur covered nethers, causing the giantess to moan slightly as her sensitive area was caressed slowly.

Then, you briefly turned around, glancing past the mountain that was Mew's belly to look right at the two sapphire mirrors at the very end of the pink landscape; the same two mirrors locked with you and were moved up and down as Mew nodded her head slowly, signaling that this was what she wanted.

This was what you wanted.

So, with the last of your hesitation disappearing into oblivion, you stepped forward, right onto Mew's slit, and bent to part the two vertical lips.

Like an old, rusty, pink gate, the legendary's vagina opened slowly, taking the tips of your feet in. Gradually, your body began sinking inside.

Mew let a moan escaped her mouth, which she covered with both her paws, attempting to hide her blushing face as well.

You slid in waist-deep.

Mew struggled to remain silent.

You sank in up to your neck.

Mew moaned.

The world around you began to fade from sight, replaced by a new, reddish, dark and slick world made of damp flesh; your only way out took the top of your head in as well right before it shut close, blocking out any eventual light.

Mew was right, you mused: it was steaming hot in her.

--

After the human's disappearing, Mew placed a hand on her quivering sex.

Her mind raced, her heart pounded her chest and lustful thoughts began speeding across her mind.

Good thing she was alone...

The pink legendary felt her sex pulsing beneath her palm and, before she even knew it, she was already rubbing the portal of your entry slowly, causing herself to grit her teeth and let a stifled moan escape.

Within the legendary, you felt the slow motions from outside; it wasn't hard to see what Mew was doing now that you were 'nice and warm' down her depths.

Your fleshy surroundings squeezed you from head to toe, dragging you deeper within the legendary giantess, who gradually sped her 'activities' up.

You just laid unmoving, letting her insides throw you around like a rag doll.

You could never guess a legendary so innocent-looking could be ever able to do something like this; yet another example that one must never trust the looks, you mused, intoxicated by the sickeningly sweet scent that lingered inside of Mew.

Deeper and deeper you were dragged, until your feet connected with a certain dome-shaped organ.

"AH!" Mew screamed from outside as she neared her orgasm; at this point, you couldn't fight your own urges anymore, and decided to help your 'savior' get the job over with.

Trying to move within the cramped confines of her vagina, you began squirming and trashing around. Your efforts were immediately paid off by the sound of Mew's moans increasing drastically ever since the first moment you began moving inside of her.

By this point, the legendary felt she could catch fire; her paws sped up, nearly burning her sex.

The mix of pleasure provided by both herself and the helpful human soon gave satisfying results: with a sharp scream, Mew finally came.

A white river erupted around you, overwhelming you and soaking you to the bone in a sticky fluid as you were washed right towards the exit of the pink cavern.

Mew let out a wave of her juices first, then a second and in the end, with a grunt, she finally ejected the tiny human from her body like a cork coming off a champagne bottle at the midnight of a New Year's Eve.

Just like a cork, you soared up in the air for a few moments, feeling void around you; cold assaulted your warm body as you began a hasty descent towards Mew, but she spared you from crashing on her, or worse on the stone floor of the cave, by catching you in mid-air with Psychic, floating you back to the safety of her tummy.

"Hu-man..." she panted, bringing a stubby paw to you, covering your body nearly entirely.

Sadly, whatever Mew wanted to tell you would have to wait: you noticed she had passed out.

So, unable to even budge her paw, you laid still against her belly, until you two fell asleep from exhaustion.
1321131121.title: Pleasant misunderstanding

choices: It worked! You began growing!... Not to full size though...
It didn't work, you were stuck like this for now...
13211311211.content:
Several hours later, sunlight began creeping in the forest as the sun slowly rose into the skies, letting the moon slowly fade away from sight as yet another night passed.

Eventually, the warm rays spread throughout the forest, reaching even a small cavern and crawling inside of it as well.

Inside, the weirdest pair one would imagine laid, asleep: a Mew and a tiny human whom she shrunk down to size just the previous night.

Mew was heavily asleep after the events that occurred in the dead of the night, and the sunlight didn't bother her one bit; you, on the other hand, were quite bothered by the feeling and opened your eyes, blinked a few times and took your first look around, noting that you were laying on a pink, furry mattress.

Far above was the face of a sleeping Mew you could recognize.

"Right... you..." you mumbled to yourself, memories beginning to find their way to your mind: you were a shrunken human who got shrunk by a Mew for no apparent reason, and she nearly killed you before she asked you to have sex with her all of a sudden.

Yup, life could be very weird at times. And this was one of those times, you mused while staring at the sleeping face of the Mew you 'befriended' last night.

It was still so hard to believe such creature could do such things.

Deciding that there was nothing interesting to do or say until the pink giantess woke up, you began examining yourself and your environment: you were still pinned down to the stomach of the sleeping titan by one of her paws which, albeit stubby, was far too strong for you to lift. Ironically, the other paw rested near her sex.

So, after a couple of failed attempts to get free, you gave up and laid still, deciding to catch another five minutes of shut eye.

You closed your eyes.

When you opened them again, you had no idea how much time had passed, but the Mew was now staring down at you with her own sapphire eyes reflecting your body and a clear blush on her pink cheeks.

For a few minutes, not you or her broke the silence, both trying to find a proper choice of words that wouldn't make the conversation too awkward.

'So... some night, huh?' didn't seem like a good way to start after what happened between you and her.

"Hey..." Mew finally shattered the silence with a simple word,
"Hey..." you replied, just as quiet as her.

Both of you went silent after that simple exchange of words. It wasn't like you didn't want to talk to her, there simply was nothing to say: what you did with her last night was clear and undeniable, there simply was no need to talk about it.

Still blushing, she looked at you with a calm expression.

"Let's go." she said, beginning to stand onto the rock she fell asleep on before hovering in mid-air.

"Go where?" you wondered as she fluttered towards the opening of the cavern, which she left, being showered by the warm sunlight of the morning.

"I'm sure you want something to eat and drink. Plus, you might want to wash up." she said, clearly referring to a certain sticky, dried liquid that once covered you. You could still feel it on you now that you thought about it.

"... I think I can help with food and water," you opposed, freeing an arm to point back at the cave,
"There is something in my bag. Let's eat my snacks. As for washing up... I agree." you said.

Mew looked back inside of the cave, spotting your bag sitting in a corner, forgotten. Indeed, Mew had totally forgotten she brought that thing along when she was busy saving your shrunken backside from the cold.

The pink behemoth looked back at you and offered a small nod, before heading back into the cave, where she placed you down and turned her attention to the bag, sinking nearly completely inside for a couple seconds, before she came back with her paws full of snacks.

Your stomach growled hungrily at the sight.

--

After having eaten your fill, you were once more carried outside by Mew; now that there wasn't the risk you could die from the cold, she could carry you around freely.

She kept her promise and made her way to a nearby lake to wash up; since you were already naked, the legendary dove right in with you still in her grip.

You felt the cool water assault you as both you and the giantess sank for a few moments; she swam deeper down, before turning back to surface.

Your body felt refreshed immediately, and sensation of Mew's dried liquids on you faded soon enough, leaving just the pleasant feeling of the water; the pink giantess herself busily groomed herself in the water, eliminating any trace of dirt or dust her fur may have collected on the cave's stone floor. She paid particular attention to her nethers, carefully washing her sex from last night's... 'experience'.

"So..." you spoke after a bit of doing nothing but swimming, keeping yourself around the giantess; if some water pokemon came out, you'd rather be around her than in their stomach,
"About my size..."

Mew sighed and offered a half-hearted shrug.

"I told you, I don't know how to grow things yet." she bluntly reminded you.

"Yeah, but I can't stay like this forever!" you countered.

Mew sighed.

"Look, I'm fairly certain I can learn the growth part," she said,
"I just need to figure it out. Problem is, I don't know how much time it'll take."

"Can't you at least try?" you insisted,
"I really need my size back, Mew."

The pink giantess closed her eyes and sighed.

"Fine." she said, lifting you out of the water with Psychic; her eyes glowed of a cerulean light afterwards,
"I promise nothing though."

You felt the glow surrounding you becoming warmer, before the light became blinding, forcing you to close your eyes for several moments, until the bright glow died down.

Hopeful, you opened your eyes to see if your situation had improved or if you were still a pathetically small doll in the paws of the giant legendary.

At first, everything was the same. But then, you felt a tingling sensation bubbling within you...
13211311211.title: An attempted fix

choices: Let Mew train her abilities on others
Stay as you are and live with her, for now
132113112113.content:
The tingling sensation intensified and you closed your eyes again in anticipation. You were feeling something so you assumed it was working and you smiled to yourself as the feeling seemed to reach its peak. All of a sudden, it stopped and was quickly followed by a gasp from Mew which made your heart sink with dread. Still being levitated with Psychic, you hesitantly opened your eyes and the sight made your heart skip a beat. It was Mew; only much, much bigger. You thought she was mindbogglingly large before but now she might as well be her very own planetoid!

Obviously, her attempt at reversing the shrinking she had done to you had only succeeded in making you even smaller. You flinched as Mew brought her stubby paw up to catch you out of the air and it felt like you were being swiped up by a fuzzy mountain. Your body sunk down waist deep into the large pink strands of fur and you struggled to stay standing from the minute movements she made as she simply held you. In the end you collapsed on your back as Mew carefully pulled you closer to her, her face essentially taking up all your field of vision.

"Um, I think I messed up," Mew quietly said.

That was the understatement of the century. The size you were previously at could be considered gigantic compared to the new small size you found yourself at now. In the back of your mind you almost expected it, she made it clear that she wasn't confident in her ability to grow things but the sheer enormity of your surroundings and Mew herself made you feel incredibly anxious. Earlier you were concerned about the idea of being small forever and now those fears were intensifying tenfold as you started imagining that same scenario but on a much worse scale.

"Are you okay?" Mew asked, guilt and concern written all over her face.

You went to speak but hesitated. Not only were you unsure of how to answer that question, you weren't even sure if she could hear such a puny thing. Eventually you spoke up and stated the obvious. "Well, it didn't work."

"I said I didn't know how to do it," she groaned. "I'm a bit surprised it backfired this much, though, I'm sorry."

"What should we do now?"

"Let's get back to the cave, first."

Mew gently brought you up to her chest and held you there as she left the water and flew to the cave. With how large her paw was, your world was engulfed in darkness and you could only see a few fragments of light through the dense fur of her chest. For a moment you began to panic as her grip lightened and you felt yourself tumbling deeper into the fur but thankfully you found yourself essentially held in place by the long pink hairs. You assumed she was being careful not to crush you because of your much smaller size but the minuscule amount of leeway she was trying to give you would have sent you plummeting down if it weren't for her fur. Your body was light enough that the fur was holding you up but you still grabbed an entire armful, just in case. You felt like a flea.

When she got back to the cave you were almost amused as she pulled her hand away and failed to find you. "Um, where are you?" she uncertainly asked. "I didn't drop you did I?"

"I'm on your chest," you yelled up to her.

You could feel her chest slowly rise as she breathed a sigh of relief and started searching for you. Looking up you could see her searching her fur, slowly parting it randomly as she tried to locate you. Were you really so small she couldn't see you? Waving your hands her massive blue eyes eventually focused on you. Once again, she sighed but this one sounded more pitiful.

"Jeez, you're really tiny."

"I noticed."

For a long moment you both sat in silence as Mew craned her neck to look down at the pitifully small human nestled on her chest. The implications of her failure to return you back to your normal size hung heavily in the air. First off, you couldn't live a life at this size and secondly, if she tried to fix it she might accidentally make the situation worse yet again. It presented quite the conundrum because if you wanted to ever be larger again, you would eventually have to risk her giving it another shot. What if she fails again? Could you even survive if you got smaller? What if you got so small you just blinked out of existence?

For a while you just pushed yourself further against her chest, resting in her fur. Reaching back, you touched her skin and could feel her powerful heart beating away inside. The concealment from the outside world and the rhythmic beating was oddly calming but eventually Mew felt like she had to address the issue at hand.

"Um, look, we've got a few options," she started. "We could try that again, it might work..."

"But it might not."

"Yeah. I really didn't think I was that bad at it, I'm sorry..."

"What are the other options?"

"I think that if I shrink other people or Pokemon I could develop the skill faster. I shrink them down a bit, try and grow them back and if I fail and make them smaller then I can just go get another volunteer to train on!"

Volunteer was definitely the wrong word in this situation but you abstained from pointing it out. You hated to think about involving others into this fiasco but it did sound like a good way for her to develop the growing aspect of her size-changing powers quickly, even if she would probably end up creating a menagerie of shrunken Pokemon. When she develops it she could just grow them all back and release them, though, right?

"Or maybe it's better if we don't try at all," she suggested. "I'm sure I can make it work; you can just live with me and i'll look after you. I mean, the arrangement might not be permanent, we might come up with something else later."

From the the way she looked it seemed she was deeply conflicted. She wanted to make it right but was ultimately unsure if she could based on her past failure. It might have just been a fluke but the dread that another attempt might fail again weighed heavily in the air. Despite that, she had condensed your options down to three alternatives; merely try again, let her train her abilities or simply live with her as is and hope she comes up with something later.

It looked like she wanted your input. Which option do you suggest?
132113112113.title: Not as planned

choices: Mew restores your size, takes you to your pack, sending you on your way.
Mew decides to keep you and take care of you.
Mew decides to put you out of your misery.
13213.content:
Before you can speak up you feel yourself pressed to Mew's chest, cutting off anything you could've said. Right now it didn't matter what your thoughts were, Mew made a snap decision as she grabbed the shit from your bag that she wanted with psychic and flew off into the air at incredible speed to your shrunken form.

The Mew was pondering the human...this was the first time she'd tried a stunt like that, and it was one she hoped wouldn't bite her in the ass. She'd been frustrated with humans coming upon her before and always eluded capture, but not before snagging a token offering from them for the trouble they put her through. This seemed a way to get a little revenge on the humans while also scoring some snacks...and of course the first human she does this to is not only in danger from the cold, but from what she could tell, he wasn't even a freaking trainer! She found nothing in his bag to indicate any of that, no pokepuffs, no pokeballs, no potions...nothing.

You were having a hard time keeping your senses together with the wind howling by you, even if you were pressed to a warm surface. You tried to adjust your head but couldn't even do that much, and all it accomplished was Mew pushing harder, stopping you from squirming out of her grasp. You felt the contents of your stomach dance around as she flew down, towards a mountain you noted, and into a tiny little cave...well, tiny to her, to you it was a grand maw, one you didn't know if you'd return from.

She landed, setting her prize in a little corner, where you noted other cheap snacks and drinks were, and she decided to regard you. You felt yourself pulled from her chest and up to her massive face, her eyes filled with curiosity.

"Little human..." She said, a suggestion creeping into your head once again, one to tell the truth. "What were you doing in the forest?" She asked, genuinely curious. Your answer might indicate to her what she should do.

"I was just taking a hike...taking in the sites and winding down from work." You said honestly.

"Did you intend to capture any pokemon?" She asked and you shook your head no. Mew frowned slightly. So this was just an innocent passing human.

But that left her at a crossroad. The right thing to do would be to grow him back, give him his clothes and send him away...maybe erase his memory of the event.

But that itself carried risks, erasing memory could cause permanent damage to your brain if she did it wrong, and if she didn't erase the memory there was a chance that you'd spread the word about Mew and what she'd done to you. There would be no peace for her in that forest, many humans would come to claim her as a prize, or they'd come in anger at what she'd done to one of their own.

She could keep you she mused...like a little pet or a little friend in a way. Company would be nice...not to mention the fun she could have with a tiny human of her own.

She could also just...end it too. At this point it could be a mercy to the tiny human, he was far too small and weak to care for himself, and the cold was eating through him fast. Could she do that though?

You looked into the eyes as Mew pulled you back and decided your fate.
13213.title: Taken by Mew

132132.content:
While on the hard, rocky floor of the cave, you heard Mew speak up in her sweet voice, yet you also sensed a bit of excited-ness in there. " Little human, how would you like to live as my pet?".

Pet? Why would you want to be a pet, especially to a creature that tried to manipulate your mind. You voice your complaints to match your line of thought. "Why would I want to be a pet? Can't you just grow me back and send me on my way?"

Mew responded back near instantly, as if she was expecting the question. "I cannot simply send you on your way, because of the risk of you telling other humans of my presence in this forest"

"I won't tell anyone about you, I promise!"

"I cannot take your word for it"

Huh. That was a reasonable response, why should she trust a random no name human to not reveal that she had nearly killed him. You decide to explore other options before submitting to Mew. "What other options do I have?"

Mew suddenly gained a sad look while looking pitifully at you. "Death."

"Death? Isn't that kinda... drastic?"

"For you, it would be a mercy, considering you nearly died without my body heat. And since I cannot send you on your way normal size, these are your only options"

You mulled over your options, but considering your options were 'death' and 'pet', there wasn't much to mull over. Well, that and you could convince her to let you go if she trusts you over the course of time. "Well, I don't want to really die, so... I guess I'll be your pet."

"That is the smart choice, Little human. I promise you will live a comfortable life, at least as comfortable as I can make it."

Mew, then hovered towards you, still towering over you, and lifted you towards her arms with her psychic powers, and held you firmly in her grasp, not unlike someone protecting something else.

You were suddenly teleported by Mew to a pink, dream like space, where Mew (and by extension you) were floating above a cloud like substance.


How does your stay with Mew work out?

A: Peaceful, you ask Mew to leave after showing she can trust you, but Mew has gotten too attached (Yandere Mew ;D)
B: Chaotic, Mew was playing tricks and games with you the entire time, leaving you little time to relax outside of sleeping.
C: Invaded, A legendary other then Mew spotted you while visiting. Mew and said legendary fight over you.
132132.title: Mew decides to keep you and take care of you.

1321321.content:
You were being hugged to Mew's chest as she looked down at you, both of you in the pink void that Mew carried you to. You felt her eyes down on you and she gave you a little smile. You looked to see that she had brought a couple of the snacks she had...and what looked to be your water bottle.

She lifted you from her chest and let you stand on her palm.

"Do you feel better here? Less cold?" She asked and you breathed a bit shakily, feeling the calm around you...there was no breeze, you felt a bit cold, probably from having issues retaining heat, but it wasn't nearly as bad. You nodded to her.

"It does feel better in here. I don't feel like i'm dying..." You said and she smiled at you.

"This is a nice little hiding spot for us then, at least until I get bored in here, or need to get supplies, might be best to leave you in here when I do that though..." Mew was saying and you gulped.

"You mean never see the outside world again...?" You said, your voice clearly not happy about that. Mew looked at you sadly.

"It might be for your own good, you can't survive on your own, and the elements are too harsh for you right now." You shook your head.

"Mew, please...even if i'm going to be with you for the rest of my life as...as your pet..." You hated saying that. "I still want to see the forest at times...feel the wind." She looked at you tensely and sighed. "We'll see, for now though, you need to rest." She said and you felt drowsy as she said that.

It didn't take you long to figure out she was doing this to you. "Mew..." You slurred before you passed out, the last thing you saw was Mew lowering you, keeping her smile as you came closer to her warm chest.

...

...

Mew for her part considered what to do. This human would be hers to protect...and she wouldn't give up her prize. Keeping him here was for his own good. He probably wouldn't appreciate seeing what she intended to do with the trainers that were out to catch her or tried to abuse the pokemon around her. That wouldn't be pretty.

But she also understood his plight, this space was pretty boring, and he'd surely go stir crazy staying here. She'd consider excursions maybe after they'd gotten closer, she'd prove to be a loving owner, a nice reward for the human that didn't mean any harm or have any ambition to bend pokemon to his will.

But for now, he'd rest. And so would she...
1321321.title: Mew's gonna keep you safe

13213213.content:
Months passed since that fateful day. The day that you had lost not only your size, but your freedom. Mew had taken to keeping you in a cage, only taking you out when she wanted to pet you or do...unmentionable things. You had given up on escape, the punishments Mew put you through for trying were unbearable. And even if Mew didn't punish you, you couldn't find any way out of the pink void. Not once had you been brought out, despite Mew saying she would think about letting you go.

Suddenly, the pokemon in question appeared, looking as bubbly as ever, despite basically kidnapping you and keeping you caged.
"How are you doing, little buddy of mine!"

You knew that not responding would only make her upset, so you responded in the way she had trained you to. "I am fine, Mistress Mew"

"That's fantastic! I have some fun games planned for us today!" Mew rushed out, obviously excited to see you once again, but the feeling wasn't reciprocated. "Now let's have some cuddles on the bed!"

You tried to back away to the back of the cage, despite knowing that it would do nothing more then amuse her. The place you called your prison opened up, and you were lifted by Mew's superior psychic abilities. You floated behind Mew, as Mew headed towards the bed she got Cough Cough Stole Cough Cough from the human world, despite not needing sleep. It was all to play with you in intimate ways, from being swallowed and pooped out, and being shoved into her pussy like a dildo.

Mew floated on the bed, and then made you float towards her open arms (Paws?). The psychic power gave out when you reached her, causing you to fall on the pink surface that saved you that fateful night, but right now holding you captive.

"Let's spend eternity together forever,no one to bother us, you haven't been escaping in a while, my life is perfect"

'But mine isn't' You thought angrily at the pink cat legendary. You had tried to kill yourself numerous times, but everything in this space was made to keep you safe, no sharp objects, and the 'floor' was like a bouncy castle.The worst part was, if Mew caught you trying to kill yourself, she would stay for a long period of time, leaving you no rest and relaxation away from the Yandere, so you stopped after the third try.

You admit that the warmth Mew emitted was relaxing, at least until you thought of what was emitting said warmth. You haven't tried to ask to go outside in a while, and you were following her every word for the past month, so you decide to take your chances and ask one more time, mostly for the chance to possibly escape. "Mew?"

"Yeeeeesssss?"

"Can you take me outside please? I promise I'll stay by you, I just want to see the outside world one more time"

Mew responded "________"

A: "Okay fine, you have been good recently, don't make me regret this." (You are stolen/escape from Mew)
B: "Okay fine, you have been good recently, don't make me regret this." (You try to escape from Mew, but are caught, and Mew is angry)
C: "Nope! Never ever! You belong to me, and me alone, so you don't ask questions!" (Mew punishes you for "Disobeying" her)
13213213.title: Unwilling Captive

choices: "And why of course! I'll help you!" she agreed cheerfully
"Y'know, you sure look... tasty..." she hinted mischievously
"You know, I believe we can help each other..." she said seductively
1322.content:
An annoying cloud eclipsing moonlight was blown away by the even more annoying wind, letting the moon do its job as its light showered both you and the legend in front of you as it extended three stubby fingers to grab you.

Its paw wrapped around your torso and scooped you up as the legendary stood up, then began hovering in mid-air thanks to a pair of wings lazily flapping on its back.

Thanks to the light, you could take a good look at it.

It looked like a (relatively) small fairy with a slim body, colored of two shades of green. On its head, two thin antennae with blue tips and gigantic blue eyes with white pupils and black eyelids.

There was no doubt, this was one of the most rare legendaries ever.

Celebi, the time-traveling guardian of forests!

You felt its grip growing tighter around your chest as it brought you up to its face, a perplexed expression painted on its face, like it was trying to figure out what you really were. Because, a human couldn't be so small... could it?

Fear seemed to finally relent and let go of your vocal chords,

"Ehm..." you started in an uncertain tone, before you cleared your throat to try and assume a firmer voice,
"D-Don't hurt me... please..."

Damn it.

The fairy cocked its head.

You saw its lips parting, and you feared that this beast wanted nothing more than to throw you inside, swallow and enjoy a nice little nap while you melted away inside its tummy, maybe providing a nice, internal belly rub in your last moments.

But such things weren't meant to happen. Not yet at least.

"Are you... human?"

If it wasn't for the solid fist holding you, you would have fallen off your perch.

"H-Huh?"

Did this Celebi just speak to you?

"D-Did you just talk to me?" you asked back, confused.

The Celebi nodded,

"Of course... but if you're able to understand me, then you're not a human. I've never seen a pokemon like you though..." it mused in a feminine voice, making you assume the Celebi was a girl.

"W-Wha- of course I'm human!" you replied, growing more and more confused each minute that passed.

Maybe this was just a very lucid dream... or nightmare...

The fairy looked just a surprised as you were.

"You're human...? But you're so... small! And you understand me!" she said perplexedly.

"Seriously, I think you are confused. You look like a human, but you can't be one. I mean-" she trailed off, but used her other paw to indicate your current size.

You sighed at the Celebi's naïveté.

"I am a human," you repeated, but her expression didn't change.

Another sign escaped your mouth as you freed your arm from her grip and pointed to your bag on the ground, right next to the empty pile of clothes.

"D'you see those? They're mine. I lost them when it shrunk, get it?" you said while the giantess looked at your belongings, now too big for you to possibly wear.

The Celebi seemed convinced, because she looked back at you with a more serious gaze,
"How did you get so small? And how are you able to understand pokemon?"

"First, could you ease up your grip? You're kinda crushing me..." you mumbled. Immediately, the fingers around your torso loosened up a bit.

"Thanks," you said,
"But telling the truth, I'm clueless about both things... maybe me being able to understand you is a side effect of my shrinking..." you theorized.

"And you have no idea of you you got so small, am I right?" the giantess asked you as she fidgeted around in mid-air, shaking you in her grip.

"Exactly," you said, before an idea found its way inside your mind.

"M-Maybe you could help me!" you exclaimed.

It seemed logic, she hadn't hurt or threatened to eat you so far, so you could only assume that this giant fairy didn't hold any malicious intent towards you.

Celebi cocked her head, much like she had done before,

"Help you...?" she parroted back, before offering a shrug with the arm that wasn't holding a shrunken human,
"I have no clue about how to restore your normal size." she said bluntly.

Your heart sank. As you began wondering if you were doomed to live your life like this, pitifully small and unable to do pretty much anything, a new idea entered your thoughts.

You looked at the time-traveling giantess that currently held you again.

"Well... maybe you could k-keep me with you!" you spoke, not able to stop the flow of words despite the look the legendary was giving you,
"I need protection or I won't be able to survive!... And i-if not, could you please put me down for I can find help on my own?" you asked.

The time-traveler blinked while she let all your words sink in her mind.

"... Nope, I don't think I'll just let you go. When will this opportunity come back?" she mused with a toothy grin, which made you gulp.

That grin alone made you reconsider all you said to this giantess since she first grabbed you.

One big question formed in your mind as you stated at that unnerving little grin of hers.

Was she going to help you?
1322.title: Little legend, big problem (or not?)

choices: She takes you back to her home
13221.content:
You looked fearfully at the toothy grin the Celebi gave you, not knowing what her intention would be now that she had you. There was one thing you knew, and that was that what came next wasn't up to you, Celebi would do as she would and you couldn't do anything about it.

Her free paw came up, and was looming over you as you shut your eyes, fearful of what she was about to do...but something seemed to be rubbing your head. When you opened your eyes the grin she had seemed much kinder, and a gentle force was rubbing your head still...she was petting you.

"I'll help you little human, don't worry." She said, a kind tone in her voice. You felt yourself settling down a bit as she said this, and she gathered up your clothes with her psychic and put them in your pack, also picking your pack up with the same force. She regarded it, and then regarded you again.

"I don't know what happened to you, but for the time being, i'll keep you safe and sound." She said and you felt yourself nodding to the giantess, a huge burden lifting from your brain. You felt yourself moving in her fist, towards her giant green chest as you were pressed against it, pinning you in place.

It was then that the Celebi flew much higher into the air, your pack coming with her as she flew about the forests treeline and away from where she found you.

"Y-you're Celebi...right?" You stammered and the fairy smiled.

"I am. Not many humans have seen me you know, in a way you should consider yourself lucky." She said, a slight hint of arrogance in her voice mixed in with her playfulness.

"And you, what's your name?" She asked kindly and you stammered it out, her not looking away from her flying as you were pressed to her chest. She nodded though.

"Well...nice to meet you!" She said as she continued towards her destination.
13221.title: Help from Celebi

choices: Celebi made it to a safer area and released you
Celebi encountered another pokemon on the way!
132211.content:
You could do nothing but stand still, tightly held by the paws paws of your green captor as she flew through the forest with your naked body pinned against her chest.

Celebi's bodily heat crafted a feeble shield against the cold that was stinging you from all sides; but it was barely enough to keep you alive as she flew, but even Celebi couldn't keep your naked body from shivering and your teeth from chattering.

Obviously, to Celebi the cold was just an annoyance, but more than enough bearable; to you, in your current shrunken state, it was like being in the middle of a blizzard.

Your whole body was rigid, and you were beginning to feel weaker and weaker, your eyelids heavier and your breath slower.

You were about to pass out, when...

"Hey!" a voice rang in your ears,
"No no no, stay awake little one!"

You fought your falling eyelids to look upwards; Celebi had stopped in her tracks and was staring down at you.

--

For the first time since she met you, Celebi took notice of what precarious predicament you were in.

The human she was holding felt like a small ice sculpture in her paws, he would have been for real if it wasn't for her body warmth.

The green time-traveler began to panic, she never had to deal with shrunken humans before, how could she deal with a dying shrunken human now?

Still, if she didn't do something quick, the tiny critter she had rescued was going to die in her paws.

Feeling a strong pity raising to undescribable levels, Celebi tried to hug you harder, if just to prolong your fragile existence for a few more minutes by transferring more of her warmth to you.

"Dear, you're freezing..." she unnecessarily told while trying to figure a way to keep you warm until she reached her destination.

Something sprang up in the fairy, who psychically called your bag, which obediently flew beside her.

She opened it with Psychic, examining its insides to check if there were any of those things humans called poke-balls.

It would be much safer for the human she was trying to save if she didn't get captured by mistake, she figured.

However, the bag was clear from any of those colorful spheres, so Celebi was free to examine the bag's contents.

Only snacks, a few bottles of water and the human's old clothes, which were now impossibly big for him to wear.

There was nothing that could pull you out of your current situation.

Celebi sighed as she turned her attention back to you, shooting a pitiful stare.

"Forgive me," she said, raising her arms a big, bringing you upwards.

You wondered what she was up to.

"I see no other way." she declared.

You were fully exposed to the sheer cold as the time-traveler broke her hug, but it was just for a second; a hasty ascend, and your world suddenly became pink, warm and wet.

It didn't take long for you to realize what was going on, and the mere thought was enough to replace all your current feelings with dread.

Celebi shoved you in her mouth!

You barely had time to glance at the outside world one last time, before the lips of the fairy fell back in place, your view replaced by very white and very dangerous teeth that seemed to pierce the darkness of the closed mouth.

Big drops of hot saliva dropped from the fleshy ‘ceiling’, hitting your body; beneath you, a large, squishy and, most importantly alive, red floor that moved slowly; behind you - you dreaded looking - there was an abyss that would lead to a certain, not to mention slow and painful death if you ever made the mistake of getting too close to Celebi's throat.

You tried to look on the bright side, it was impossible for you to enter hypothermia in here... but you really couldn't figure if you were safer in here or out there.

Ultimately, you decided to just sit still, trusting that the giant fairy you were inside of didn't have any malicious intent.

After all, she was helping...

... Right?

Not really sure about how long your well-being was going to last in the near future, you sat unmoving on the Celebi's tongue and waited.

You really hoped you were going to get out of this large cave unharmed.
132211.title: Dangerous safety

13222.content:
"Y'know, you sure look...tasty," She said. Before you could do anything, she stuffed you in her gob. Her purr of delight rumbled around as she tossed you about. Who knew humans were this GOOD?!
