13223.content:
The giant Celebi that held you kept that grin painted on her face as she stared at you silently.

Her fist opened up, letting you lay against her palm.

You wondered what she was up to.

"S-So? Are you going to help me?... Please?" you repeated your request, but she paid it no mind.

She seemed to be examining your naked body from up close; her gigantic eyes paid particular attention to your-

Blushing furiously, you slid your hand down, covering your crotch the best you could.

Only then the Celebi seemed to snap out of her trance,

"Huh?" she exclaimed as a blush spread across her cheeks, though her grin remained; if anything, it grew wider.

"My apologies, human. Sure, I will help you," she intoned, her free paw rising to your head as she began petting you. You felt a brief wave of relief spreading through your body, but it waned soon enough as the fairy spoke again,
"Actually, I think we can help each other out."

That grin and the blush became wider while she said that.

You, however, didn't get the meaning of it, but felt regardlessly uncomfortable.

"What do you-" you abruptly trailed off.

You had completely forgotten about the cold that never left during the whole conversation with Celebi, and now it was causing you to shiver physically.

"H-He-Help..." you stuttered, a thick cloud of vapor coming out of your mouth as you spoke.

Against to what one would expect when someone is dying in the arms of someone else, the Celebi smiled sympathetically.

"Um, this nasty cold is doing you no good." she unnecessarily stated, before looking off to the side,
"Now, can't let you pass away on me, can I? You're way too... useful for that."

You didn't like the way she said it, nor the way she was acting in such situation.

She said she was going to help you! She-

Like a light shining through the darkness, a newfound warmth rapidly spread through your body as something soft began wrapping around you.

With little relief, you noted that Celebi, keeping her smile, was glowing of a green light; and, as she did, your body felt warmer and warmer.

Glancing down at your own body, you noted with amazement that a blanket of soft grass was wrapping around your naked body, forming a cocoon around you.

"D'Aww, you look so cute like that little human!" the green time-traveler cooed as she stopped glowing.

"Now let's find someplace warmer, so we can... get to know each other."

With that, you were lowered down and pressed against the fairy's chest; her other paw joined you as she embraced you and fluttered off into the forest.

Unable to move, you could do nothing but lay your head against the soft green wall and waited.

At least, you didn't feel cold anymore. Instead, you were surrounded by a comforting warmth.

You whispered a ‘Thanks’, which the giantess seemed to hear, because she smiled down at you warmly.

And finally, Celebi fluttered in front of an opening.

A cave.

The time-traveler hovered inside, deep into the shelter.

Only when she reached the furthest point from the entrance, she sat down and laid against the stone wall, keeping you restrained in her embrace.

"Now, I'm sure this'll do. You were really about to die, huh?" she said bluntly, causing you to sigh.

"... You saved me," you stated,
"Thanks."

Celebi smiled.

"You're welcome little human!" she exclaimed cheerfully, before adopting a big smile.
"Now we can finally talk. If I'm not mistaken, I mentioned that I was going to help you... and I will. In exchange, could you help me?"

While she said that, her voice assumed a weird tone, and her cheeks grew red again.

Again, you felt uncomfortable, but you found the courage to ask,

"Help you with what?"

Celebi didn't initially reply, but you discovered that she was breaking the hug; she held you in her palm while her finger slowly traveled to your grass protection.

A tiny nail pierced your green shield and began sliding along your body, breaking your the grass that surrounded you, leaving your naked body uncovered once more.

Again, cold greedily drove its metaphorical hands on you, gripping you from all sides and causing you to shiver.

"H-Hey..." you stuttered, but Celebi silenced you.

"Hush, my tiny friend, I've got plenty of ways to make you warm," she hinted with a mischievous voice, and you finally managed to decipher the tone she had previously assumed.

Lust.

Celebi continued,

"If you only agree to ‘help’ me like I'm helping you..."

Your gaze traveled down at this, and you nervously noted that she was slowly spreading her legs.

On the endless green, a bright pink slit came into view, causing you to blush furiously.

This gigantic time-traveler wanted to use you!

With horror, you realized that you were being lowered. This was it, you figured, you were going to be shoved up there to pleasure this perverted Celebi only to survive! That's what she meant with ‘help’! That's why she was acting like that!

You watched with fear as the fairy placed you not inside of her like you expected, but on the floor, in front of her towering form.

"So? What do you say, little human, are you going to help me? I did help you, and I still am, no? I think you owe me something..." she said sultrily, but somehow managing to keep a somewhat arrogant tone, mixed with a mischievous playfulness.

You considered the choices you were given; this Celebi had helped you escaping death, so you could just ‘help’ her back and get this over with. In exchange, she was probably going to keep you safe while you were so helplessly tiny.

But it all felt so wrong that you seriously considered refusing.

That didn't seem an available choice though.

You feared that any refusal might not be taken well by the legendary, so you either helped her or ran like hell, hoping you managed to escape her. Though in such scenario your chances of survival out in the cold were practically null.

What could you do?

She'll help you find a way to get big again

1322311.content:
Heat rapidly spread through your body, which was still soaked in the Celebi's juices despite having been dried up by the fairy herself.

"That was wonderful..." the time-traveler moaned again, her embrace growing tighter around you.

"Th-Thanks?" you stuttered in response, your cheeks adopting a very deep shade of red as you realized that you had just given yourself to this fairy's desires; practically, you became a sex toy for this giantess.

It was a humiliating thought, but a voice in your head quickly told you that you did it just to get the giantess' help, surviving by doing so.

In this dire condition you found yourself in, you couldn't possibly survive out in the cold on your own. But with the help of a legendary pokemon...

You sighed, unable to shake off the humiliation. But at least, you thought, you weren't cold anymore. The embrace of Celebi felt very warm; that was, of course, the last of your concerns, because you were busy pondering your life in the near future.

"Hey, why that long face little human?" the voice of Celebi, whom you miraculously were able to understand, rang,
"Now that you've helped me, I'm gonna help you! Isn't that what you wanted?"

The sentence was enough to make you feel relieved.

"Y-You mean," you began,
"You're going to help me find a way to get back to my original size?"

Yours was a truly polite request. Despite that, the giantess that was embracing you adopted a very perplexed look.

"Now, why would I want to do that?" she asked you.

If it could, your jaw would have dropped to the floor - what!?

What was that sentence supposed to mean!?

"W-Wh-What?" you asked, unable to believe what you just heard and self-convincing that you heard wrong.
"Come again?"

The fairy giggled.

"I mean, look at you! You're so cute like that!... Besides," she paused to let a blush spread across her cheeks,
"... I have no idea how you shrunk or how to grow you back."

Your heart sank. So you were doomed to live out like this? Shrunken and in the hands of some random legendary?

You discovered that, under distress, your brain worked better.

"B-But, you can time-travel, no?" you recalled the power this particular legendary possessed, traveling through time itself at will,
"We could find out how I shrunk, prevent it, something!"

By this point, the green giantess was smirking.

"Why would I want to grow you back? I mean, I'm sure you'll understand that the chance to keep a human to myself are quite low... if not non-existent." she replied.

Just what was going on, you wondered, this couldn't be happening for real. That's it, this was only a nightmare.

You took a deep breath.

You were going to wake up in your bed soon and never take strolls in the forest ever again, you decided.

You just had to wake up.

Sadly, it didn't happen soon like you would have much appreciated, so in order to accelerate the process, you freed one of your arms from Celebi's grip and began pinching yourself repeatedly.

You felt pain, and your arm began taking on a slight purple shade, but you didn't care, you wanted to wake up.

Above you, Celebi giggled, finding your actions of amusement.

"What are you doing silly?" she asked childishly,
"I know, this might sound like bad news, but it'll be fine - you'll be fine. I'll take good care of you, promise. You'll be warm, fed, safe and sound under my protection!"

Realizing that this horrible nightmare was nothing but the cold, hard reality, you looked up at the fairy, flabbergasted.

"So I'm basically a pet to you!" you exclaimed in alert.

So that's what she was planning to do with you, keep you like a pet AND a sex toy, a simple item for her to use whenever she felt ‘playful’!

The blue-eyed pokemon smirked at your declaration.

"A pet? You think I'd treat someone who just literally gave himself to me like a pet? I don't think so. " she bluntly told.

You found that, while she said that, her body began hovering in mid-air; her embrace loosened, and the fairy held you up in front of her face, her smirk wider than ever.

You considered shouting for help, but your mind quickly told that it wouldn't get you nowhere, but would surely anger the legendary; you were alone in a cave, lost in the middle of the woods and in the dead of the night.

No one was there but wild pokemon, so no one was coming to save you.

Your only shot was relying on yourself.

You waited for the fairy to do anything, but she didn't seem intentioned to hurt you; on the other hand, she now wore an almost loving gaze on her face.

"And how could I?" she continued saying,
"No... more like..."

She paused, but her face came dangerously near you. For a moment, you guessed you were going to feed this legendary, but it never happened; instead, she turned her head, beginning to rub you against her left cheek, causing your own cheeks to flare up to indescribably hot levels as the Celebi affectionately nuzzled you.

"I'll protect you, little human, I promise you'll be fine."

13223111.content:
Though the contact with Celebi's green skin was warm in contrast with the cold air that bellowed inside the cave from outside, you didn't feel any better.

This legendary could easily help you with a quick trip back in time, but deliberately chose not to.

Despite this, you decided that asking again was worth a shot; after all, Celebi was acting childishly, and any kid needs a bit of convincing before doing something.

"Um... Celebi?" you called, trying to pull yourself back from her cheek by pushing onto it.

It didn't work, but you could at least free your face to speak.

"Yeah?" she asked.

"I know what you said but... I really need your help." you said,
"Maybe you can't grow me back up, but with your powers, we can discover what happened to me and maybe fix it!"

At the mention, Celebi pulled back and opened her mouth to speak, but you continued without giving her the chance,

"I can't live like this, Celebi. I have a life, I can't throw all that away!" you complained.

The green fairy closed her mouth and looked up, seemingly pondering an answer, before letting out a sigh and looking back at you, her cheeks suddenly flaring bright red - the giantess was flustered.

"It's not that easy." she said,
"If something like this happened to you, it means it was bound to happen. There's no telling if even I might be able to undo this. I'm sorry."

You looked down, then back at her.

"So there's not a chance."

Celebi shook her head, then gave a smile.

"Look on the bright side," she happily said.

"There's none."

The fairy giggled.

"Yes, there is. You're just being a drama queen." she teased,
"Silly, you have me! From now on, I will protect and feed you, okay?"

You didn't smile.

"... Why are you even doing this?" you asked.

Even if she offered an explanation, she did mention she wanted to keep you because it was an 'opportunity'.

Celebi sighed and her expression fell.

"Have you got an idea of how hard is to be a legendary? Do you know what that Implies? I'll tell you - other pokemon avoid you." she said, her tone switching to a sour one,
"They're afraid of the power we carry. Even the big mean ones keep their distance. I'm supposed to be a guardian of forests, and what do I get out of it? Nothing. No friends. Not a challenge. Not... a mate." she blushed at the last bit,
"I mean, come on, it's not like I'll kill ya! I have needs too!"

You blushed too and wondered if her 'needs' were the reason why she asked you to 'help' her. You also felt a tingle of sadness for the frustrated legendary.

"You too suffer solitude, huh?" you told sympathetically.

"You have no idea." she replied, before lightening up a little,
"But, hey, that's when you come in! What do you say? Will you stay?"

You closed your eyes at the offer that was presented once again. This would mean throwing your life away to join a lone legend.

You pondered your options.

Staying with a friendly legendary or taking your chances outside with hungry giants and a deadly cold.

Even if the situation was dire you, like any other being, valued life very much. Your choice was obvious.

"Alright." you said, not really sure but not really getting a choice,
"I'm in."

Celebi smiled massively.

"Great!" she exclaimed, pretty making your ears ring for several seconds,
"I promise you - I'm gonna take good care of you! I won't let anything hurt you!" she said.

You offered a shaky smile, understanding Celebi's point of view a little; evidently, you were the first one to ever get this close to Celebi, so it was natural she was excited.

"Thanks, I guess..." you replied, still not really convinced about this.

The fairy's response was to pull you in a hug to her her green chest.

"Don't worry, human, it's gonna be great." she reassured in a soothing tone, pausing a moment to rest the bottom of her head on the top of yours in a display of naive affection, before continuing,
"Now come on..."

13231.content:
You felt the amazement growing to indescribable levels.

In front of you, laying belly-down with a surprised expression on its face was white pokemon with a yellow, star-shaped head and big blue eyes which were undoubtedly bigger than you. It also had two tails swinging on its bottom.

It was Jirachi.

You couldn't describe how you were feeling at the moment and couldn't decide if to be scared or amazed to be in presence of such being.

Slowly, the legendary reached out to grab you; you watched the three tiny fingers fidgeting in anticipation as they approached you.

You stared, unmoving, unable to decide whether you should have moved or remain still.

However, before you could make a decision, it was made for you; the Jirachi cautiously grabbed you in its three-fingered paw.

It was being rather gentle considering that you were currently the side of a really small bug.

Carefully, the legendary began hovering in mid-air and kept staring at you intently, probably wondering what you were.

"Are you... human?"

You blinked as a voice rang around you. You instinctively looked up at the legendary holding you.

"H-Huh?" you squeaked,
"Did you just talk to me?"

The Jirachi nodded.

"Of course, human," the Jirachi replied, now sure about your species. Not only you looked like a human, but you spoke in human language too. There was no denying what you were.

A smile crawled across the legend's white cheeks.

"How did you get so small, little guy? I thought your kind was bigger than this. But you look so incredibly cute like that!" the Jirachi spoke again in a calm time that let a hint of excitement escape.

You felt utterly amazed.

Not only you were given the chance to meet a mythical pokemon from up close, but you got to talk to them too!

With a mix of excitement and fear, you began examining of the body of the titan holding you, wanting to make sure it was just like you had seen it in lifeless photos.

It looked exactly like the pokemon you saw in the pictures, though only one thing differed from what you saw.

The tails were the same; the eyelid on the belly was the same; the head was the same.

But Jirachi's vagina, a bright pink slip that jumped out on the endless white of its body was definitely a detail that escaped you.

You blushed furiously as the information that this titan was in reality a titaness sank in your mind.

Researchers always declared that most legendaries were genderless aside from a few exceptions like Latios or Latias, but this just proved that they were just as clueless as you were.

"Ahem."

The sound snapped you out of your thoughts, causing you to realize you were still staring at Jirachi's vagina.

You looked back at the giantess' visage, who was smirking down at you.

"See anything you like?" she asked, causing your already red cheeks to adopt an even stronger shade of red.

You didn't reply.

"I asked you how you got so small, little one." the giantess repeated, not a hint of malice in her voice nor annoyance from your earlier, intent staring at her nethers.

"O-Oh... I don't know!" you replied roughly brought you back to your current situation all of a sudden: shrunken and naked into an endless forest, in the hands of a legendary pokemon, one of the most powerful beings on the planet.

If you ever made the mistake of angering this Jirachi, you were probably going to be erased from existence, although this little legend was supposedly gentle.

Still, you had to pick the right words.

"I-I kinda woke up like this shortly ago and you found me..." you meekly stated.

"So you don't know what or who shrunk you? Dear," the Jirachi said sympathetically as she lowered herself, sitting down on the cold hard ground.
"Quite the predicament you found yourself in, huh?"

"That's right," you confirmed sourly, trying to ignore the cold that kept penetrating your body through your uncovered skin.

If you didn't found a source of warmth soon, you were going to enter hypothermia before slowly freezing to death.

Of course, your brain registered these as secondary information, because your main objective right now was to get help.

And since this legendary was the only one that found you so far...

"I need-" a small breeze blew past you, causing you to shiver from head to toe from the cold.

"I need help..." you whispered, your plead escaping your mouth in the form of an incredibly small cloud of vapor.
"Please..."

The Jirachi cocked her head.

"Is that a wish?" she asked you.

What was that supposed to-

"Yes!" you exclaimed, remembering that this legendary was supposed to be able to grant wishes.

"I-I-I mean yes, th-that's my wish... could you help me out, ple-ple-please?" you stammered from the cold, which kept closing its jaws around you like a feral beast.

It wouldn't be long before you lost consciousness.

"Hmm..." the oblivious Jirachi mused as she pondered your ‘wish’.

132313.content:
"Of course I can help you, although…I'm afraid my help does not come for free." Why oh why did there have to be some sort of catch, and just as you were THIS close to passing out from the sheer cold. Thankfully, it seemed like Jirachi caught on to this and wrapped you in her arms, bringing you up to her stern yet gentle face. While you appreciated her warming you up, you were still concerned by what she meant when she said that her help "did not come for free".
         "To grant any wish, one must etch their heart's desires on one of my three talismans. Given my size, it would be impossible to write so much onto one talisman, so small illustrations best help me understand what it is one wishes for." That much made sense, but it still didn't exactly answer why she worded herself the way she did earlier, and it showed on your face so Jirachi took more time explaining the mechanics of her wish-granting to you.
         "Because I am expending much of my energy to help you, I am left quite defenseless after doing so for the time being, and I cannot grant another wish until my cosmic power has been restored. To ensure my safety, I steal away to a quiet retreat, preferably with another pokemon who will protect and nurture me until I am fit to be out and about again. One way I can ensure that I will be tended to is to…give my protectors something to do for me in the meantime—or rather someone to do as you humans may say." You almost didn't catch the meaning of what Jirachi meant, but when she sat you down to take a cross-legged posture before you, arms at her side and with a purposefully coquettish stare, it was almost impossible for you to not pick up on what she wanted.
         "I have been quite lonely without a suitable mate for some time, and you humans have fascinated me so when it comes to carnal matters. If I grant you your wish, o' human, will you grant me mine?" With that, Jirachi opened her legs and revealed her vagina to you once again, this time in a deliberate showing of her own rather than you happening to catch a glance of it. This almost came as a surprise to you that pokemon—a legendary one in this case—were even capable of soliciting others for sex in exchange for favors; you didn't want to think of it as prostitution, but given Jirachi's comments it wasn't helping with the mental image. While it was a tempting offer, there was no way of knowing whether or not this "wish-granting" pokemon was really telling the truth or simply making things up to use you for her own ends. Still, a slim chance was better than no chance, and a part of you was desperate enough to take it. Plus, the way she invitingly laid against the wall—legs spread apart for you to see her increasingly puffy and moist privates—was unbelievably arousing. The pokemon sure knew how to sweeten the deal, and after much deliberation you came to your decision…
