13233234322322.title: Suicune, Entei or Raikou?

choices: Hitch A Ride On The First Person You See
Hitch A Ride On The First Pokemon You See
Stick To The Road's Edges And Keep Dodging Everything Else
Look For Something And Catch Their Attention So They Can Help You
Go Back For Your Stuff And Wait Until Something Chances Upon Your Stuff
14.content:
You decided that it was best for you to get back to the main trail, hoping that if you were careful enough then you would easily get back into town. The rest of your belongings would have to be left behind for now, but you doubted that anyone would steal your stuff if they chanced upon it. With your mind made up, you went on ahead with your unclothed self and made for the trail. It wasn't all too difficult to find the road despite the huge setback in your small size, but you soon found that finding the road was the least of your worries. Along the trail were several people and their pokemon out on a jog or whatnot, and not only did you have to avoid being spotted by the wrong type of person, you also had to make sure you didn't get squashed flat in the process.
         Chaos ensured shortly after finding yourself back on the road—pokemon and their trainers alike had nearly smashed you into a red paste on more than one occasion, even near the edges of the trail, and by then you were acutely aware of just how much danger you were in. You didn't know how exactly you would get back into town at this rate, constantly dodging the myriad of shoes and paws trampling about, and it was all too soon that you would end up regretting your decision to venture out into the open. Back with your things someone would eventually have to find them and you would invariably be spotted if you positioned yourself well enough, but that would only work if someone benevolent came along rather than a pokemon looking for a snack or some other misfortune. You could still make it to the town and find someone to help you, assuming that you were willing to hitch a ride on a(n) (unsuspecting) person or their pokemon, or you could look around and find someone who was simply admiring the scenery with no particular place to go for the time being. One thing was for sure: you were tired as hell from dodging everything and everyone out on the open trail, and if you didn't want this to keep up you would have to make up your mind soon before you ended up getting no help…
14.title: Make for the trail, hoping to maybe get back to...

choices: You proceed into the wilderness, seeking shelter.
You decide to make for your pack and scale it
15.content:
You stood in the stillness of the night, on your shirt shivering and a rather revelatory thought came to mind...damn you needed to warm up.

You knew that at your size you wouldn't last too long out here, regardless if a pokemon found you or if the cold got you. You breathed into your hands before you decided to move, hoping to find a low to the ground place to duck in and warm up, avoid danger.

This of course, left the seed in your mind of if you found an inhabited little place to hide by mistake. At this size you were a damn bit vulnerable, and honestly still confused about the whole thing that had happened to you. When you stepped off of your shirt, getting ready to go into the forest you found the cold ground hard on your bare feet.

"Shit!" You cried out, the sensation unpleasant and catching you off guard. You looked to your pack. That would probably be a nice shelter...if you could even get into it with your diminished strength and size.

You bit your lip, you needed to decide quick. The longer you were out in the open the more likely it was that something would happen to you.
15.title: Escape the cold night

choices: "Are you okay little human?" She asked concerned
"Finally up? Good." She said in a mischievous tone
152.content:
You shivered a bit before a thumping made you more aware of how quick you needed to move. The thump was rhythmic, almost like footsteps and you fell forward once again onto the cold ground as the booming got closer. You felt the cold of the ground seep into your bones as you looked forward to see dark paws in front of you. The black paws stopped as the owner of them noted the abandoned pack and clothes.

You looked up to see that...it was indeed a pokemon. You followed the shape of her body up, to yellow-orange fur...a fox like face...a stick in its hand. You noted that it was a Braixen...you saw a slit between its legs too, making you blush as you confirmed that it was a she.

For her part she regarded the stuff in front of her with confusion, was a human out here? This far from the town and they abandoned their belongings. With a boom on your ears she moved for the pack and went to hoist it up, finding it surprisingly heavy. Her eyes widened at this, and she looked around the ground again before her eyes fell on you. You gulped, the piercing red eyes seeming to penetrate you as you shivered not only from the cold, but now fear. This Braixen was easily the size of a building to you.

"H-hello..." You stammered out and she tilted her head. A great sound resonated as the Braixen dropped to her knees and you stumbled around, trying to get your bearings. You got your senses in order as a paw seemed to descend upon you, its shadow eating up your vision as the warm fingers wrapped around you. Immediately you were constricted and lifted from the harsh ground, high high up to her face.

"P-please don't hurt me...I don't know what happened to me..." You said, still afraid and her mouth opened in shock at this confirmation. It really was a tiny human.

Though a small thing for her, her mouth opening frightened you. It would be very easy for her to put you in there...tear you to shreds with those sharp teeth of hers. You whimpered a bit, and your stomach lurched again as she got up from her knees and put her stick in her tail, keeping you in one hand. She regarded your clothes and picked them up.

"What are you doing?" You asked, curious and she looked at you briefly before ignoring you and going to your pack. She fumbled with a few free fingers that had your clothes to open the pack and she put your clothes in them before closing it again. With a giant grunt and an impressive display of power to you she lifted the pack that you would never be able to budge on your own with that free paw and looked at you one more time before she started walking away from the scene.

"Where are we going!? What are you going to do with me!?" You squeaked out as your world shook, and she seemed to ignore you as she kept moving.

Your stomach seemed to lurch with each step she took and after about 15 or so minutes she made for what looked like a dark cave.

The uneven terrain had done a number on you though, and you felt yourself having a harder and harder time clinging to consciousness. By the time she'd settled in and set you down you were already fading fast. The last thing you remembered was her lighting her stick with a gentle flame, and using it to provide you a bit of warmth as you passed out.

-

"...ngh..." You mumbled, as you opened your eyes. There was warmth around you...but no flame you noted. You couldn't move you found too, and you felt...fur against your being? Looking around you found that you were against a wall of yellow orange fur, with white furred fingers keeping you pressed to it. When your eyes went up your heart nearly leapt out of your chest as the Braixen that had abducted you was looking right at you, those eyes piercing you.

She opened her mouth once more, this time letting you hear her voice.
152.title: Found by a wild Braixen

choices: She had a gentle smile and kindness in her eyes, the lick was to comfort you.
She put you in her mouth, she liked how you tasted!
She lowered you to her nethers, getting ready to play.
1521.content:
"Braixen? Brai?" She said in a questioning tone...though you had no idea what she was asking. You couldn't understand the question. All you did was squirm slightly in her grip and she closed her mouth. You felt the fingers around your back that were pinning you to her chest fully wrap around you as you were lifted up to her face, in her eyes you saw an air of curiosity as she regarded your pitiful form.

You had no idea what she could be thinking...

The Braixen herself was still processing the fact that in her grasp was a tiny little human. She saw humans come through here from time to time, usually passing by, many of them trainers trying to capture pokemon. She'd had her handful of encounters with humans that wanted to tame her, but each time she evaded. There were many pokemon out there that would like nothing better than to bond with a trainer, but that wasn't her. No thanks, she much preferred true freedom. Though there were times she envied the bond she'd see when a trainer was being kind to a pokemon...or the times that a despicable human abused pokemon as well.

She wondered what kind of human this one was. While he slept, chilly from the night with no clothes or fur to protect him she'd rummaged through his bag, helping herself to a bit of his snack food that was in there...but she found no pokeballs. Just some survival stuff...food, water, a sleeping bag just in case...rope, knife, but nothing that would indicate that this human was a trainer. If anything he seemed to be a hiker or camper.

She also noted how fearful he was of her, and how confused he was as well, so whatever happened to him...he probably didn't know either. A tiny human...this was quite the catch she mused, a slight smile on her face.

She knew what she'd do with him.

For your part you gulped, seeing her smile. You couldn't possibly know what she planned for you.

It was then that you noted her mouth opening again.

"En...Braixen." She said and you found yourself being pulled closer to her mouth.

"N-no please! Please don't eat me!" You cried out but you didn't stop moving closer as soon you saw her sharp teeth, her long tongue, and felt her warm, moist breath on your face. The muscle that was her tongue departed past her lips to greet you and soon the soft squishy surface came upon your face, completely engulfing it and covering your face with her saliva. She licked your face a few times and you shut your eyes, whimpering as you had the warm wet substance covering your hair and face.

Soon enough she pulled back and you opened your eyes, seeing how the Braixen was looking at you and wondering what she'd do next.
1521.title: Braixen's plans for you

choices: She spits you out and keeps you as a pet
15212.content:
Braixen's original plan was to keep the shrunken human as something of a pet. The idea of reversing the roles between humans and pokemon amused her greatly. However as the massive bipedal fox creature gave you what was supposed to be a playful lick, she noticed something. This tiny, naked human actually had a great taste to him. Sure there was some dirt and whatnot mixed in with the taste, but she was surprised just how wonderful you tasted to her. She attempted to control herself, trying to remember the plan to keep you as a pet, but soon the fox couldn't help herself as you found yourself sliding back into her mouth. You struggled against her overpowering whims, trying everything in your power to avoid those sharp teeth and the all devouring black hole behind you. Of course Braixen had no intention of chewing you (at least for now she didn't). She just wanted to savor your taste. Her tongue quickly pinned you to the roof of her mouth as her hot, humid, and rather odorous breath washed over you, consuming several of your senses.

The tongue gently rubbed back and forth against your bare back, providing an oddly comfortable massage as she continued to taste you. Of course your weak struggles amused her. But as she leaned back slightly she stopped, remembering what exactly was inside her. This wasn't some common berry or animal she could eat. This was a shrunken human. Great taste or no, this was something incredibly special. And if she were to eat you, she sure as hell wouldn't be getting another, as food or as a pet like she originally planned. Even if she didn't care about your fate, if she wanted to experience this again, she would need to keep you around. Though part of her still wanted to know how you'd feel going in. Was she willing to give everything up for a quick meal.

Braixen pondered her options carefully. Despite the past few minutes she really did want a human pet. And aside from taste, you would certainly be able to provide a lot of amusement for her through various means. But curiosity and urges still lingered. And that taste. Could she say no to them.
15212.title: Braixen's Food or Braixen's Pet

152121.content:
You were helpless to do anything to get out of this. The most you could do was pray that Braixen would release you from this prison in one piece. As Braixen enjoyed a few final licks against your squirming body, sense and self control finally returned to her as she buried the urges to eat you. After all, she had much bigger plans for the tiny human. Soon the Licking stopped and you fell back onto her slimy tongue. “XEN!” The fox spoke. From within her mouth the voice was booming and echoed all around giving you the scare of your life. Soon you felt a powerful force pushing you past the tongue and the sharp teeth. Within seconds you were back in the outside world, though pretty disoriented from the events that lead to hear. You eventually crashed into the fennic pokemon’s awaiting hand paw, laying in a puddle of her saliva.

Braixen examines you excitedly. Her mind went back to all the humans who attempted to capture her. All the ones who successfully got a few of her friends. Now the tables were turned. Now it was the human’s turn to belong to the Pokémon as some sort of pet. The thought of this role reversal made her grin at you as you slowly regained your bearings. Carefully she closed her hand around you as she made her way for your bag to look for something to complete her control and ownership over you.

Braixen knew she needed something to keep her pet in line. Something to keep him obedient and prevent him from running away. Humans typically use pokeballs to achieve this with her kind, but unfortunately for her, she didn’t have anything of the sort that could be used on a human, even a tiny one. But maybe you had packed something that she could use for this. Keeping you in a fairly tight grip, she dug through your bag, tossing aside snack bags and underwear. Finally she spotted something that could work. With a cheerful “Brai!” the fox pulled out a spool with string. You originally packed that in case your clothes ripped since you were going to be traveling for a while with a limited number of clothes. However, now it’s purpose would be to give Braixen a tool and symbol of her ownership over you.

You tried to resist, but it made no difference. Braixen was still able to easily the the string around your body, careful not to make it too tight on you, but strong so that there was no way you'd ever undo the knot she made. Holding the remaining long end like a leash, Braixen smiled, proud of her work.
152121.title: Pet of a Pokémon

choices: Braixen gently pins and rubs you with it
Braixen stops. You apparantly won the game
1521211.content:
As you tugged futilely on the makeshift leash Braixen made for you, the fox watched amused by your attempts. She pondered if this was what it was like for something to be trapped inside those red and white balls. Finally deciding to take a bit more of an active role in the fun, Braixen had a game in mind. One she was sure you wouldn’t be too fond of, but one that your master was going to have you play anyway. Holding this much power over a human was almost intoxicating to the fox Pokémon.

You kept tugging at the knot trying to free yourself (for whatever good that would do given the massive Braixen right over you). Unsurprisingly, you couldn’t even loosen it slightly. Suddenly, your owner tugged on the string, pulling you up against her footpaw. Braixen seems to try explain something to you, but of course, you only heard her repeating bits of her name along with some growls. Braixen noticed your confused expression and quickly thought of a simple way to summarize the game.

Leaning down, Braixen placed her hand near you using her fingers to act like a little person with legs. Suddenly her other hand slammed down towards it, only barely missing the other hand as it moved at the last second. “Brai?” She asked seemingly trying to determine if you understood what she was describing. You still have her a confused look. You assumed the first hand was supposed to be you. Were you supposed to avoid something? Sighing Braixen stand back up and tugs your string a bit pulling you in front of her. Before you could act, you saw her footpaw hovering over you. You screamed and tried to get back up, but the string was holding your leg down. You watched in fear as the paw came down quickly. Suddenly at the last second, your owner tugged the string again pulling you out of the way just as the paw slammed down. “Brai?” She asked again cheerfully. “You... want me to dodge your foot?” You questioned causing her to smile and nod. “Are you crazy? That’s not a game! That will get me killed!” Braixen just shrugged seemingly not caring. You wanted to argue some more, but the raising paw quickly shut you up as you stumbled out of the way at the last second. The game had begun.

Braixen enjoyed herself, toying with you for the most part, though you did surprise her by dodging the steps that were intended to pin you. You on the other hand were having a decidedly less enjoyable time. Each step boomer inches from your body. You were terrified for your life as you barely stayed in this game. The paws kicked up a little dirt and dust with each stomp coating you and causing you to cough. You wondered if this game even had a win condition for you or if it was just a sadistic game of torture for Braixen’s enjoyment. You knew so little about her that you felt it could go either way.

As your legs started to tire after a few minutes, You ended up tripping over your leash string while dodging one of Braixen’s stomps. You were out of breath and sluggish from all the constant action. You knew you wouldn’t be able to get back up in time. Rolling over you saw the fox creature’s paw in position right over you. With a terrified whimper, you braved yourself for what might be the end.
1521211.title: Braixen wants to play

choices: She decides to be a bit nicer
She give you a break, but then it's back to it
She doesn't care about your words and continues playing
She decides to punish her pet for his words
15212112.content:
You closed your eyes, whimpering and saying some last prayers as Braixen's paw lowered down, ready to stomp you into oblivion you surmised. You felt the intense pressure lower down onto you in mere seconds, and prepared for the crunch and great pain that would come.

It never came though as you tried to open your eyes and saw the dirty sole of the pokemon on you. You struggled and tried to move, but you were pinned down pretty hard and couldn't budge. It was then that the surface above you moved to the left, you rolling along with it as you were scraped along the ground and found your face down in the dirt now.

She was gently rolling your body around under her foot. It was then that you heard yips from up above as the Braixen was laughing at you and your situation. She rolled to the right, scraping you along again and rolling you around as you found yourself swallowing dirt in the great roller coaster of this whole ordeal.

You tried to open your mouth to say something, but you found it difficult to even talk right now. She kept this up for a few minutes, though to you it was hours.

The Braixen was having the time of her life. She couldn't believe how easy it was to dominate this little human, it was pathetic really. She smirked as she rolled you around on the dirty ground, savoring the moment. She wasn't even the least bit tired from that little 'play' session either.

It was only after a few minutes of this that she lifted her foot, content with this little game. She looked down to see the tiny form of the human facing the ground, not moving.

You felt the intense pressure lift from you, but by now you were so tired that you hardly had the strength to even move. You groaned as you felt a tug on your leg. That damned string.

You tried to kick at it, but it did nothing but exert more energy as you were dragged along the ground, and then up into the air, the string digging into your leg as this happened. You grunted in pain but it was over soon as you fell into the furry palm of the Braixen as she grinned down at you, dirty and wet from both sweat and her spit from earlier. You looked a bit scraped up too, but nothing terribly serious. Her fingers wrapped around you as she lifted you to her face. "Xen? Braixen?" She asked, kinda smugly, almost in a condescending tone. You didn't know what she was trying to communicate but you hung your head.

"Just kill me if you're gonna do it..." You croaked out. "Because I honestly don't know what the hell you're trying to do to me aside from torture me." You didn't know what her intentions were, she just seemed to be playing sick games with you as she stuffed you in her mouth and then tied the string on you, probably to make sure you didn't run away, then that stomping game.

Braixen tilted her head. She wasn't trying to kill the human, just have fun with her newest pet. She didn't give a damn about if it was what he wanted, but she wasn't trying to kill him.

"Xen? Brai?" She seemed confused with her words and you looked her in the eyes, finding some form of courage to glare.

"I said just do whatever you're gonna do! I don't want to put up with any more of your sick and twisted tricks! Were you the one that shrunk me down you freaking fox!? Because it wouldn't surprise me!" You shouted, hoping that if she wasn't going to let you go, that this would at least make her finish you off.

That's when you started to think straight again though...and realized you just told off a giant fox that had just shown in a variety of ways how she could end you and the power she had over you. You gulped and was thinking maybe you should apologize.

The Braixen was a little surprised by your words though, this little human was yelling at her, as if he had a say in what happened. This was only right, he was a human, one of the stupid humans that captured pokemon and took them away, making them fight, or making them pets. This was what he deserved.

...But by the same token, he didn't seem to be a trainer either, and didn't have anything in his pack to indicate as such. She sure wasn't going to give up this source of entertainment or fun, but maybe she'd been harsh on him. Though why was he yelling like this, if not for her he'd have frozen to death too!

The Braixen made her choice.
15212112.title: Talking back to Braixen

choices: She gives you something simple to do
She goes right back to the rougher games
She wants you to show your love and loyalty for your master
152121122.content:
Braixen saw a look of fear return to your eyes. That little defiant streak was gone and instead her pet was remembering just who held all the power here. Still she was hesitant to actually punish you for it. After all, you were no doubt still adjusting to this huge change in your life. On top of that, you just got through a handful of exhausting games for her amusement. Perhaps a break would be the best thing for the both of you.

You watched her awaiting her wrath. The fox giantess certainly wasn’t going to tolerate your little outbursts. But strangely she wasn’t looking at you in anger or anything of the sort. It was almost a cheerful smile actually. You weren’t sure if this was worse than anger but then you saw her reaching for you. You didn’t have a chance to flee when she wrapped her fuzzy digits around you and pulled you closer. The body heat comming from Braixen was actually quite comfortable to you, but you weren’t going to drop your guard just yet.

Before long you were deposited on the fox creature’s lap. The abundance of fur, mixed with her body heat made this position very comfortable for you, but you were still very weary of the giant. Seeing the fear remaining in your eyes, Braixen smiled and started to pet you. Though she still viewed you as her lesser, Braixen didn’t want to appear as a cruel owner to you. “Brai!” You has no clue what she was saying, but she didn’t seem to mean you any harm. As a clawed finger started to gently scratch your back, you started to relax a little.

About five minutes later, you opened your eyes and looked back up at Braixen. She really did look like a powerful figure from your point of view. Noticing that you had finally calmed down, Braixen petted you a few times before moving her paws away. “T-thanks... does this mean you’ll take this off of me?” You asked lifting the string. Unfortunately, Braixen only responded by laughing and wagging a finger. Well so much for freedom, but you supposed it could have been much worse. Though being a fox creature’s pet is still pretty low on where you hoped your life would take you. With a defeated sigh you figured you might as well accept it now. She might be bossy but at least she’s not outright malicious. She seems concerned enough to calm you down at the very least.

As your break neared it’s end, Braixen pondered what to do with you next. Perhaps she should ease you into your new life. Then again, she was the master so it was still up to her.
152121122.title: Some time to Rest

1521211223.content:
Braixen opted to still keep things simple, but that defiance you showed, though she wouldn't punish you for it, needed to be nipped in the bud. You were her pet, and though she would keep you from getting seriously hurt, you needed to be taught your place, and you needed to accept it as well.

Furry digits wrapped around you again as she lifted you from her lap and set you down on the dirty ground again...you were looking up at this fox with a mix of confusion and trepidation. Just what was she going to do now? You hoped it wouldn't be painful. She was smiling before she pointed at you, then her footpaw in front of you.

"Xen!" She said in a cheerful tone as she made a rubbing motion with her hands. She wanted a foot rub? Seemed simple enough...you nodded with a gulp before approaching...god, this paw towered over you. You reached out, slightly hesitating before you touched the paw. It felt surprisingly soft...you started to rub it before you felt a tug on your 'leash' as she pulled you away and she looked down at you before doing the gesture again quicker and harder.

She wanted you to put your back into it? That seemed to be what you were getting from this. You approached again, and with a grunt, put your whole body into rubbing her paw.

Braixen sighed as you did this, it actually felt great to have you do this. Yup, not eating the little human was a good call. He would remain hers for a long, loooooooong time. She had a smile flit on her muzzle as you worked, sweating quite a bit as you did. She'd keep you in good condition, fed at least too, but this was the beginning of your life at her whims and there was one more thing that would seal that for her.

You grunted before once again you felt a tug as she pulled you back to look at her face. She wore a smile on her face before she nodded. "Brai! Braixen!" She said, almost in a cooing tone. You thought she was saying good job. She then pointed to you, then the sole again...then made a kiss motion with her face and a lick motion.

She wanted you to kiss and lick her foot? You almost retched at the thought...but you didn't want to learn what a real punishment would be like from this fox pokemon either. She was holding your life in her hands, pretty literally.

She still had a smile, and she nodded at you before she used the leash to force you into her foot paw. You looked up and gulped...those toe claws looked awful sharp. You looked ahead to the furred flesh...if you did this, it was the ultimate degradation...pretty much admitting she owned you...but the alternative...
1521211223.title: Proving your loyalty

15212112231.content:
The choice you were being thrust into weighed on your heavily. By going through with this you were degrading yourself. You would be effectively admitting that you were less than human, or in this particular case lower than a wild animal even. And yet, there didn’t seem to be a real choice here. Though Braixen was being relatively nice to you now, she has shown that she can effortlessly overpower you. End you with a thought. Or more likely, keep you alive and make your life a living hell.

By now you saw that Braixen was getting a little impatient with your inaction. Not wanting to be yanked by your leash yet again. You swallow the final shread of your pride and lean into the black paw preparing to sign your life away to the godlike fox creature.

Braixen watched you curiously, unsure if you were actually going to follow through with her Command. Though your face was not concealed by her black paw, you did have thatdefiant streak before. You could simply try to trick her by faking it. However her paw twitched as she felt your lips making contact with the sole. You had actually done it. A massive grin spread across Braixen’s face as she felt your lips contact her paw once again.

”Brai!” her voice echoed above. It didn’t take a psychic to guess what she was saying though. You had only fulfilled half of her command. You still had to lick the soles of the massive creature. You briefly grimaced as you looked back at the paws. Unsurprisingly they had some dirt on them. It’s not like she wears shoes or anything like that. Though the alternative flashed in your mind, you couldn’t help but feel like you were going to regret this action. With that you stuck out your tongue and began licking your mistress’ paw. The toes flinched a bit as they felt your wet muscle rubbing across them, picking up an odd dirty and salty taste. To Braixens credit, the paws could have been much worse for you, but that was only your secondary concern for now. At least you hoped this would mean she’d take care of you.
15212112231.title: Submitting yourself to Braixen

choices: Braixen has a few more things she wants to do with you
152121122311.content:
You shuddered as you kept licking before a tug on your leash signaled you to stop. It was a bit gentler than the previous tugs as a shadow enveloped your figure. You looked up to see furred fingers once again descending upon you, and soon they pinched you up, lifting you higher and higher to Braixen's face.

She looked quite pleased, as well as a bit smug as she regarded you in her grip. She dropped you into her free palm and leaned back a bit, against the cave wall. You sat in silence for a bit before you started to feel a bit of cold seep into you, it was still the night wind making its way into the cave you surmised. Braixen noted this and soon a wall formed behind you, blocking the wind. You looked back to see she had simply curled her fingers up.

"T-thank you..." You said, she arched an eyebrow, as if expecting you to say more. It dawned on you what she wanted.

"Thank you...master..." You said and she smiled wider before yipping again. She was laughing at you.

"Brai! Braixen!" She said in a happy tone as she got up, making your stomach lurch. She kept you in her hand, not even bothering to close it into a fist around you as she approached your bag. Opening it she fumbled through it with her free hand and you wondered exactly what she was doing. The last time she did this she got out that string that she'd tied around you...you hoped it wasn't anything terrible that she was pulling out.

Eventually she pulled out what looked to be...a bottle of water. Ah, she was thirsty.

"Brai, Braixen!" She said as she looked at you again, she looked at the bottle, then at you.

"Um...I am thirsty, thank you master?" You said, hoping that's what she was asking. She rolled her eyes before sighing.

"Brai!" She said, looking at the bottle, sounding annoyed.

"Xen!" She then looked at you again.

"I don't know what you're...do you want to know how to open it?" You asked and then she nodded. You sighed internally with relief. This was going to take getting used to in terms of learning what she wanted.

"You just twist the top part of it, and it comes off." You said as you made the motion with your hands. Braixen nodded at this before she walked back to the wall, you in one hand and the bottle in the other, and sat down again. She set you in her lap as she went to open the bottle. As she did you licked your lips, truly thirsty. She managed to get it open.

"Brai!" She let out happily as she started to chug it down. You paled...did she even intend to give you any water? You sat in her lap, almost feeling yourself want to cry before you felt a tug on your leash.

"Braixen." She said as she offered you the cap...it had a bit of water in it. looking at the cap was odd, it was a bit bigger than a dinner plate or bowl to your scale, and it had a bit of water.

"Thank you so much!" You said as you reached for it, but she pulled it back and she looked at you expectantly.

Of course...

"Thank you master..." You said, a bit hesitantly as she handed the cap to you, letting you take it. You started to greedily chug down the water as she looked down at her new pet, almost fully broken in.
152121122311.title: Accepting life as Braixen's pet

1521211223111.content:
As you finished your cap of water you heard a drawn-out "Xeeeeeeeeeeeen.” echo from above. Braixen was yawning, and to be honest you were feeling pretty tired as well. With a gentle tug of the leash, Braixen slowly made her way home, expecting you to keep up the pace and remain alongside her. Partway through the walk, you tried to hitch a ride on Braixen’s paw. However, your owner was having none of that and with a quick tug you were removed from her leg and forced to walk once more. "Brai!" she said sternly as she wagged a clawed finger while trying to scold her disobedient pet.

The walk wasn’t particularly far, though you did struggle to keep up with your mistress’ pace before she would tug at your leash once more. Never enough to harm you or trip you, but enough to send the message to hurry up. The aside from the cold hitting your exposed body, you were reminded of how much you relied on this fox monster, and how pathetic you were in comparison. Hell you were struggling to keep up with her walking pace, and based on her grin she was probably thinking about the same thing. Soon you reached your destination, a hole that presumably lead to her den or something of the sort. With another yawn, Braixen started to pet you once more. Despite the embarrassment you had to admit that this did feel nice.

As the two of you entered your new home, you were relieved by the relative warmth compared to being outside. Pulling out her stick, your mistress lit up the dark area revealing a small series of rooms she must have dug in the past. There were several twists, turns and presumably dead ends for security’s sake, but your owner knew the way without a second thought. You realized that this little underground maze effectively killed your chances of escaping Braixen. There was probably no way you’d be making your way out of this place alone. A grim thought, but one that you more or less accepted back when you licked her paws. Still, it was disheartening to see your faint hopes of a normal life be extinguished.

Finally Braixen reached what you assumed was her living or sleeping quarters. It was a modest room some places to sit, eat, and rest. As the fox laid in her sleeping area, you felt your leash being tugged as she started pulling it in. You weren’t sure what she wanted since she was so silent, but soon you found out what was going on. Driving her stick into the ground, Braixen started to tie her leash around it to secure you in place. Pleased with her work, she let out a lazy ”Braiiiix” before falling asleep. Through the limited lift you saw that you were stuck near her lower body. At best you could probably reach her legs if you tried to approach her. You felt tired but we’re a bit hesitant. You could rest against her for added warmth and comfort, but you would be against her paws if you tried, more or less putting yourself in another demeaning position. Your alternative was to stay by the stick and rest there. It wouldn’t be as comfortable, but maybe you could retain a shread of dignity through all this.
1521211223111.title: Time for bed...

choices: Braixen has some ideas for what to do with you in her den
Braixen has ideas for what to do with you in the forest
There's a sudden noise...something is in her den
15212112231111.content:
The wind wasn't getting to you anymore at least, but the trek out in the exposed cold, trying desperately to keep pace with your owner as she simply walked about, with no fur or clothes to protect you left you feeling frigid once more. You breathed into your hands, hoping to warm up, but it wasn't doing much...her stick also wasn't burning anymore so you weren't going to get anything from that.

You groaned, hating yourself for what you were about to do...but honestly, you'd already thrown away your dignity the second you licked this fox's feet, and you didn't want to be this miserably cold anymore. You got up, walking your way towards Braixen's feet, as you felt a bit of heat radiate from them, her natural body heat. It wasn't much most likely, but to you it beckoned you forward as you laid down with you back and feet pressed against her black paw, feeling the leathery texture of it as it warmed you up from the back.

With a sigh you then turned to lay your hands and chest into the paw, curling yourself into as much of a ball as you could around the foot.

This must've looked pathetic, but you didn't care anymore. What was there to really say or do, at this point you were at the whims of this wild pokemon, and she wasn't torturing you at the very least, so survival meant accepting your place in the world, right? If so you'd accept it while being as comfortable as possible.

These thoughts rang through your head as slowly you nodded off, allowing sleep to overtake you.

-

Braixen woke up with a bit of a yawn as she felt something resting against her paw. Groggily, she looked at her stick still in the ground, and the leash of her little pet human leading to her...paw. She looked down to see the tiny human sleeping, curled into a ball at her paw, trying to keep himself as close to it as possible. She found this both amusing and slightly adorable as she got a bit of a cocky grin.

He wasn't taking long at all to adjust to his new life she mused, as she pulled her paw away to see what he would do. He didn't seem to wake up...but he started to shiver in his sleep. So he had been cold.

Braixen for her part got up with a yawn as she reached for her pet with a clawed finger, gently poking him to wake up.

For your part you felt a warm, furry surface pounding on your back, not hard enough to hurt, but enough to jolt you to wake up. You tried to get your senses about you before you heard a "Braixen!"

Right, your owner...it disturbed you a little to think how easily that thought came to mind.

You looked up at this goddess of a pokemon as she regarded you with a look of mischief before grabbing her stick and untying your leash from it. From there she picked you up with her furry palm and closed her fist around you. Both to help you warm up, and to remind you of your status in this world since you had no hope of breaking her grip.
15212112231111.title: At the paws of your mistress

choices: She gives you a break and takes care of you
She “punishes” you, secretly enjoying your resistance
She moves on to her next game
152121122311111.content:
As Braixen held you hun her paw you felt an unusual surge or warmth surround you. Given that she was a fire type, she might have been actively trying to help warm you up. A reward for submitting yourself to her and accepting your role as her pet. Though this fact haunted you a bit, you didn’t really care too much right now. For the most part you were thankful that your... owner (you still had trouble swallowing that one) for her show of kindness. A simple reminder that you could have ended up with much worse than her. Though you still wish she didn’t openly enjoy teasing and demeaning you so much. Still, you counted your blessings and enjoyed the warmth.

As the paw opened back up, you saw her other hand holding her stick, which was producing a small flame nearby. You were quiet for a moment as your eyes adjusted to the surroundings. “Thank you... mistress.” There was a trace of reluctance in your tone as you hit that final word, but the rest of it was clearly genuine. Braixen only smiled more in response and gently petted you with a finger before setting you on the ground. At first you were confused at her intention before she made a kissing motion and set her footpaw right in front of you. Not even awake for five minutes and she was already at it. You briefly made an annoyed face before quickly changing it, hoping she didn’t notice. Though she didn’t appear to react, Braixen did see your initial reaction. Unknown to you, she secretly liked that her pet still had some bits of fight left in him. But for now he was being obedient and accepting her superiority over him.

As you drew nearer her leathery toes wiggled in anticipation. You tried to force out any conflicting thoughts for now, fearing how your owner would react if you did anything she viewed as misbehavior. As you leaned in to kiss the toes, a strong odor seemed to radiate from them. You tried to hold your breath as you leaned in closer by suddenly the toes opened and grabbed your head, trapping you in place. The odor got stronger as you swear you heard the fox giggling overhead at your struggles. As you squirmed and pushed against the leathery digits you finally forced yourself free, coughing and gasping for air. As you recovered you looked up to see Braixen smirking overhead. You can’t tell if she’s just being playful or if she’s planning something.
152121122311111.title: Braixen continues to demean you

1521211223111112.content:
Braixen enjoyed that little spark you had, even respected it a little, but all the same she needed to 'punish' you. She needed to enforce your place in this world, and your role as her pet, regardless of anything else.

As you gagged, crouching down, your hands being supported by your knees you felt a rumble. It was Braixen planning something you figured. You looked up only to gasp as her foot was raised above you, a slight frown on her face. Uh oh...You fell back, looking up at her and pleading. "P-please mistress, don't crush me, I-i'll kiss the toes, okay?" You pleaded.

Braixen liked this response...all the same the only thing you got was a larger frown as Braixen sighed. "Xen. Braixen." She said in a flat, almost scolding tone as her paw came down. You tried to crawl back but you got nothing as soon her foot covered you, pinning your back to the ground and your chest and face to her paw. You squirmed a bit, trying to get out but gained no purchase as her paw consumed you. It reeked, and yet...it felt warm, and almost soft...until she started to apply a bit more pressure.

"M-mistress...please..." You croaked out as you felt more and more discomfort. It was then that you noticed an odd feeling around your lower body...as a certain part of your anatomy started to react. Was this turning you on!?

Your eyes widened as you tried desperately to get out, but nothing was giving. The paw started to move, slightly rolling you around much like last night, and your dick reached full mast as this happened.

"P-please stop!" You cried, panic gripping you.

Braixen meanwhile was just smirking at this. You were certainly feeling the pressure as she gently rolled you around. Honestly she wasn't even trying to be rough at all, it really took next to nothing on her part to keep her pet in line. She was blissfully unaware of the full extent of the situation though, until...

There was a wetness that was on her paw now. Her eyes slightly widened. Had she crushed you by mistake? She hoped not...she didn't want to lose her pet, and a small part of her would feel bad if that had happened too. She lifted her paw to see you panting. Then she looked at her paw to see a splotch of...white liquid...her face went to you in shock.

You put one hand to your crotch to cover it, and the other to your face to hide your shame. You couldn't believe that this giant animal had just gotten you off...this was maybe the worst humiliation you'd suffered yet...and you now had no idea how she was going to react to this. You really hoped she'd show mercy, but when you finally got up the courage to remove your hand and look to her distant face, the expression she carried was...
1521211223111112.title: A punishment by Braixen and your ultimate shame

choices: Handed off to a new unpleasant owner.
15212112231111121.content:
The expression your fox goddess was giving you made you fear for your life. Though Braixen loved the rush of power as she dominated the pathetic human with virtually no effort at all in her part, she found this particular response to your torture to be disgusting. While you continued to cover up your privates in shame and fear you continued to cower before her as she looked down at you with a mix of disgust and anger.

“P-please mistress.” You whimpered up to her “I tried to stop it. But... but the grinding and the pressure.” Your begging was cut off as Braixen slammed her foot down inches from you. ”BRAIXEN!” she shouted at you. Though you couldn’t understand her words, you had a pretty good idea that she was ordering you to shut up, which you promptly did to avoid puttijt her in a worse mood at you. Without warning, you get a powerful tug from your leash causing you to fall onto your back. As you laid on the ground unable to explain or defend yourself you felt that same organ that got you into this mess starting to stiffen a bit once more. You quickly moved your hands back to cover up hoping she didn’t notice. Wether or not this was successful was unknown as she was pretty posed at you to begin with. As the angry looking goddess stood tall, you watched in silent fear as she prepared to dicipline her pet for his lack of self control.

Option 1: Braixen forces you to lick the paw clean. Both of your seed and the dirt from her slamming her foot down.

Option 2: Braixen settles for the old fashioned punishment. She lifts you up and spanks you

Option 3: Braixen pins you under her sole again and rubs and grinds even harder. Better show some self control this time or else.

Option 4: Braixen is so disgusted she gets rid of you, giving you to someone she thinks you’ll find unpleasant.
15212112231111121.title: Disgusted

choices: She grants you a small amount of pity, and gets the ointment
She isn't getting any ointment for you, you need to learn
She isn't getting any ointment for you...but she also takes another mercy on you
She's angered that you'd ask for ointment, and punishes you further!
152121122311111212.content:
You looked up at this looming goddess, full of fear as she glared down at you, she crossed her arms as she regarded you. "Braixen." She seethed, you could feel the anger as she considered what to do with you. You whimpered a bit, but didn't speak for fear of making it even worse for yourself.

Wordlessly you felt a jerk on your leash as you were lifted up, it was digging into your skin as she pulled you slowly, up and up to her face by your leash. You hung there, wincing in pain as her expression did not change. She dropped you into her palm as you landed on your back, dizzy and stumbling as your hand fell away from your crotch, luckily your boner died down from all of this but it didn't save you from her wrath as her free hand lowered down, she had a claw...a sharp claw dangerously close to your male anatomy...she could easily separate in from you right now with no effort, you felt your face grow pale as you looked up to her face, tears starting to well in your eyes.

"P-please not that mistress..." You whimpered. Her expression held fast for a moment before it softened just slightly and she sighed. "Braixen." She said simply, in a scolding tone to let you know you weren't out of the woods yet. You felt a lurch as Braixen used her free hand to flip you onto your stomach, your face down in the soft fur of her palm. Two fingers curled around your arms, preventing you from moving no matter how much you squirmed, which you found yourself doing on instinct.

You had no idea what was about to happen until...

*WHAM*

A sharp, sharp stinging pain invaded your ass as Braixen brought her finger down hard on it. "A-aahhh..." You slurred, as it stung hard.

*WHAM*

"AAAAAAAAAAHHH!!" You screamed in pain, not able to hold it in as she spanked you. This was some of the worst pain you ever felt as she easily punished you for your lack of self control.

"P-please..."

*WHAM*

You were crying tears at this point, as they fell into her palm, you started to see spots in the blur that was your eyes as the pain in your ass was nearly indescribable. After this last one she flipped you around again, the red ass touching her fur ignited the pain once more as you screamed and Braixen looked down at you with a scolding look. It was an upgrade from her pure rage earlier.

"Aah...aah..." You said, in shock from the pain and trying to scramble to your feet, anything was better than sitting down. You managed to scramble up onto your knees at least.

You wouldn't sit for a while...you remember you had something in your bag though!

"Braixen..." She said to you in a scolding but questioning tone.

"I-it won't happen again mistress...i'm sorry" You said, bowing your head. She nodded, seemingly content. You hesitated to ask her...but you couldn't imagine even trying to sit like this, and the only one that could get the ointment out of your bag was your mistress.

"P-please...it hurts so much...please...in my bag there's some ointment for this kind of pain...i'm begging you mistress." You said, tears in your eyes. You looked up, hoping she'd take mercy.
152121122311111212.title: Braixen Spanks you

choices: She was licking you to clean you up
1521211223111112122.content:
As you pleaded your case to your owner up above with tears covering your face, your arm gently rubbed the afflicted area, causing you to wince slightly. You hoped Braixen would show you mercy, but her expression remained unchanged from the stern one she had since you promised to keep yourself under control.
“Xen.” She said in a calm tone. Since she knew you couldn’t understand her language, she shook her head no to give you a visual cue. “Braixen Brai Brai Braixen.” Again you didn’t understand her, but it was clear she wasn’t changing her mind. You were being punished and she was going to make sure you learned from this experience. She wouldn’t be doing a good job of that if she let you off easy.

Though you couldn’t be certain, you had a pretty good idea about her intentions and reasons. You knew better than to keep pushing for it, thankful that she’s at least not punishing you further for asking. Tears still covered your cheeks from the searing pain. Braixen noticed this and felt a little sorry for you. Though her expression and intention did not change. You still needed to learn your lesson. Tough love is such an interesting concept. Finally you laid down on your stomach to give your sore legs a break without putting any added pressure on your bum. As you tried to rest and heal, you soon felt something large as Braixen...
1521211223111112122.title: Braixen Makes you Learn Your Lesson

choices: She was going to the local stream
She was going to what looked to be a gathering of pokemon
Before she reached her destination, a trainer approached
15212112231111121223.content:
You felt the titanic Braixen tugging at your leash gently, coaxing you to your feet. You felt so weak, in terms of your place in the world and in terms of stamina and how your bum felt, you didn't know if you would be able to keep up with whatever Braixen wanted. She didn't say anything to you, not that it would matter since you couldn't understand her words. The ground trembled a little bit to you as she started to walk, tugging at your leash as she did, forcing you to follow. You winced as you walked, the pain still quite fierce from your mistress...spanking you.

She walked at a pace that kept it hard to keep up, even if you were able to walk normal, which made it worse. Braixen was keeping an eye on you, and gently trying to tug to make you keep up. She did feel somewhat bad for you, and she could tell you were hurting, but she would NOT tolerate another instance of what happened this morning and that needed to be ingrained in her pet, both for her sake and his sake because if there was a next time...the punishment would be much more severe.

You were watching the winding twists and turns around you, unable to keep a map in your head of where you had come from and where you were going. This Braixen was smart in terms of her den at least, no way she'd be found sleeping by any hostile pokemon or trainer that could catch her. After a bit though sunlight started to shine on you as you exited the den, with your towering mistress.

She let a smile play on her muzzle as she saw the new day, and she looked down at you, only to frown. It was clear to see now that you were staggering and struggling to stay on your feet, quite tired, and very very dirty. She sighed as she saw the pathetic state of her pet.

You didn't know how much longer you could walk before you felt the powerful gaze of the fire fox that held your life. She reached down with a paw and you gulped, not sure what she was going to do. You felt two fuzzy pincers pinch around your stomach and back, and you ascended into the air before you were dropped into a furry palm, a wince and grunt coming from you as your ass touched down, still raw from earlier.

Braixen looked at you with a more neutral expression before she spoke. "Braixen." The tone didn't seem angry, and you had no idea what she intended by saying it the way she did, but she was carrying you now, something you greatly appreciated as she made her way through the forest...at a much quicker pace.

The many hills and rocked she went over so quickly made you assume she picked you up so you wouldn't slow her down at this point, and you were a little thankful you hadn't eaten for a bit because you would've had a hard time keeping your stomach down otherwise.

You gripped onto the fuzz in her paw as much as possible, just trying to stay on board. Braixen for her part wasn't paying you much mind as she made for her destination, and after a few minutes it became clear where she was going.
15212112231111121223.title: Out with Braixen

152121122311111214.content:
Braixen stares down in disgust at her pet. This was the final straw by losing his self-control. Dragging the human behind her on the leash, braixen walked towards a puddle, and dipped her paw in to clean it. When that didn’t work braixen got an idea. Bringing the human into the air on it leash, braixen took hold of him on her claws and used the human to scrub her paw clean.
