Braixen walks back towards her home and stares at the human dangling in front of her. She doesn’t want to kill him, but doesn’t want to keep him ether. Letting him go will only make the human happy so Braixen smiles as she decides to give you to another Pokémon as a pet. And as further punishment she will make sure must to one you will find unpleasant. Taking a detour from her home braixen walks though the area until she sees the perfect Pokémon to give you to.

“Braixen! Bra! Xen xen!” You hear her shout out. It startled you and you noticed that she didn’t take you back to her home. She seems to be talking to another Pokémon. Her tone was harsh as she lifted you up to her face, but she smiled and giggled as she talked to the Pokémon you could see. Suddenly your thrust towards the other Pokémon and dangle I front of it face, as it takes the leash from Braixen, and grins at you. You curl up as it finally hits you tgat you have been given to this Pokémon as a gift. You see braixen walking off out of the corner of your eye, and turn to see you’ve been given to a...
152121122311111214.title: Handed off to a new unpleasant owner.

1521211223111112143.content: Though Braixen considered handing you to one of the two walking piles of toxic waste, she was unsure if you would even survive being with them in your state. Thankfully, the perfect candidate soon appeared as Braixen gleefully handed you over to a...
1521211223111112143.title: Another Pokémon

1522.content:
"Are you okay little human? Warm enough?" She asked, a hint of concern in her feminine sounding voice...wait a sec...you could understand her!? You could feel her chest beating as she had you pressed to her chest, and could feel the plush fur tickling at your skin. It wasn't entirely unpleasant, especially the heat. You were still wary of this giant though, and more or less trying to comprehend everything that had happened to you.

"I'm...not sure if i'm okay, but yes, I am warm. T-thank you very much!" You said before the Braixen smiled gently at you, looking almost harmless as she had her mouth shut, not showing you any of her razor sharp teeth. "That's a bit of a relief, still though...you can understand me huh?" She said, still smiling and you hesitantly nodded. "That's certainly different. A tiny human that can understand pokemon. What are you doing out here?" She asked as she pulled you away from her chest, still keeping you clutched in her furry fingers. You were lifted to her face as she examined you with curiosity. "How did you end up like this?" She asked, somewhat curious before you shook your head.

"I really don't know...I was hiking the normal trail of the forest, went off of the trail a bit and then...passed out and woke up like this." You said as she frowned at you. "Just hiking huh? You're not a trainer?" She asked, a hint of suspicion in her voice. You shook your head vehemently at this. "N-no, never been one. I just work in the town and enjoy hikes." She still had a bit of a suspicious expression before it softened. "Hmm, well okay then. I didn't see any of those little red and white balls in your bag so i'll believe you." She said. It was then that she reached for something and brought it towards you. It was a giant, brown, sweet smelling bar. A chocolate bar from your pack. It looked like it had already had a few giant bites taken out of it, probably by Braixen.

"Here, you need to get something in your stomach. I gotta say, human food is really sweet." She said, as she used the hand not holding you to hold it close. You gulped before you took a bite, finding it a little harder to break off with your reduced size, but still managed to get a bite. You took a few more bites before stopping and she set the bar down, before she presented a water bottle in front of you, this made you nervous as you felt like you could drown in it, but she kept control as it was brought to your lips, and she let you drink as much as needed, tilted enough to not overpower you. After this you sighed as she set the bottle down, cupping you in her paws.

"Well you're more than welcome to stay with me little human. I've been a bit lonely here and could use the companionship." She said smiling, you frowned at this though. "But I gotta get back to town, I have a job, a home..." You said before sighing.

"I don't know if giving you back to the humans would be the best option. No offense, but I know what your kind is capable of, and with a tiny human like you...I shudder to think what could happen. Don't worry, I won't harm you, so i'm gonna keep you here as..."
1522.title: A kind Braixen

15221.content:
The words, spoken in a kind voice by this warm fire type that was keeping you warm, still managed to send a shiver down your spine. You wanted to shut your eyes, wake up back in your bed and let this all be a bad dream, but it wasn't. This Braixen, essentially a wild animal...planned to keep you as a pet. You looked up, at the far distant, massive face of this Braixen, who was giving a gentle smile to you, and felt a pit in your stomach as you averted your eyes from her, looking down at the still far off ground of this cave.

"Please, I don't want to be your pet. Just take me to town...please." You pleaded as you looked up at her, she still kept her smile up, but shook her head at your request.

"I'm sorry, but no, that isn't gonna happen. I might get caught, and you'd certainly be taken and kept somewhere considering that i've never heard of tiny humans like you. Trust me, being my pet is what's best for you." She said, still friendly, but almost firm.

"But being a pet...that's...so degrading." You said, she frowned at this.

"Doesn't stop you humans from keeping pokemon as pets, does it?" She said, again, not angry, but the way she said it almost made you want to turn and run if you could.

"I've never kept a pokemon as a pet...and besides, a lot of pokemon are happy to be with humans as pets, they co-exist well." You said looking down at the paw you were in.

You felt a large, fuzzy force press down on your hair, rubbing you, before that same force started to stroke your back. She was petting you. You suddenly felt the warm, soft, and admittedly pleasant touch of this pokemon making you a bit calmer. You looked up to see her smiling.

"And you can be happy being my pet, I promise, i'll take good care of you little human. I won't let harm come to you, and I'll keep you fed, warm, and safe." She said, trying to calm you.

You opened your mouth, wanting to protest once more, but the words died in your throat. If you kept pushing your luck...you didn't know if she'd do anything. Still though, were you okay with this?
15221.title: Her pet

choices: Opt to take it slow and relax
152211.content:
To say you were okay with this would be a lie. Instead, you were considering to accept her demand simply because it offered you the best chances of survival in this new and enlarged world. You were tilted towards acceptance because by all means it could have been severely worse. You could have been eaten and lying in pieces in the belly of a wild Pokemon or be tortured by one that has a grudge against humanity, yet despite the odds you were found by a kind Pokemon with the desire to protect you.

Yes, her insistence of you being a pet could definitely be seen as self-serving or selfish but she also showed a genuine kindheartedness about her. One of the first things she did after finding you was to take you somewhere safe, feed and hydrate you, after all. You could even feel it in her paws as she held and stroked you. Her grip and each brush of her finger was incredibly gentle which let you know she was very well aware of how vulnerable your new condition has left you, or rather how easily she could hurt you if she wasn't careful.

She looked down at you with a soft smile as she patiently waited for your input. Try as she might to come off as friendly and reassuring you still couldn't help but be downright intimidated by her size. A single flick of one of her fingers could break your rib-cage, or worse! And would she still be the same kindhearted Pokemon if you decline? You groaned, as much as you wanted to say no it absolutely was in your best interest to say yes and you were sure the Braixen knew that, too. "I guess," you muttered.

Braixen's ears perked up, almost looking surprised. "You're fine with being my pet?"

"Yes." You quietly said. The admission kind of stung and you turned your face from her huge dark, orange eyes. Or at least you tried, Braixen simply turned your body in her paw until you were facing her again. The smile she kept was replaced with a worried frown.

"It's not going to be that bad. I'll take care of you, remember?" The fire fox said. She gently eased you lower until you were sitting on the yellow fur of her 'skirt' around her hips, Braixen still resting her paw on your back so you don't fall or run off. You think she intended lowering you would make the environment feel more casual but it only succeeded in making her look bigger. "I'm going to make it work."

"Sure, It'll be fine." You said, more to yourself than her. Braixen seemed to be content to just let you sit there for a while to perhaps let you get used to the size difference between them. She stared at you with warm regard and smiled before she lent back, still keeping a firm paw on your back to keep you sitting up. The two of you sat in silence for a while and you decided to focus your attention away from the giant Pokemon, quickly noticing you could hear the sound of soft rain. Turning your head you saw that you and Braixen were in a small dark cavern, although even by her standards it wasn't that roomy. It was open enough that you could see the forest and small droplets of rain falling down outside.

"Do you live here?" You asked. There wasn't much else in the small cave besides your backpack she took and her stick which was letting out a small flame. Braixen gave your question a little laugh.

"No, just hiding from the rain. It looked like it was going to rain when I was taking you home so I took you here just before you passed out. My home is much more cozier than this place, we can head out when it clears." Braixen explained. The two of you sat in silence for a while and you were almost starting to enjoy the warm comfort her fur offered before she cheerfully spoke up. "Hey, I wanna do something, want to play with me?"

"Play?" You asked, feeling skeptical.

"Well it's raining so I thought we should bond a little, y'know? I know your still adjusting but I think we should get acquainted sooner rather than later." You could only give her an apprehensive look. What would 'playing' even entail? Braixen saw your uncertain look and turned her head away bashfully. "Or we could just relax together or something? I mean I'd take you to my place to give you a tour but I don't want to go out in the rain, so that's out."

Braixen wanted to play with you; how, you didn't know. You were considering going along with it and getting thrown into the deep end to hopefully get the whole 'pet' treatment out of the way off the bat. She also seemed a little reluctant to rush you so if you spoke up you might be able to relax with her instead, although you didn't know what that entailed either.
152211.title: Reluctant Acceptance

choices: The next day you head out and explore
Something spots the bag while you’re inside it
You hear a lot of commotion, like many differant Pokémon outside
153.content:
As the sun began to set and the darkness grew with each passing minute, you knew you needed to find some form of shelter and fast. Looking back to your bag, now the size of a small building you knew this was your best bet for warmth and shelter for the time being. Maybe if you were lucky another trainer would spot it and take you back to civilization where you could get help. At the very least there was food in there so you would be able to camp out for a while.

You grabbed onto one of the straps and pulled yourself upward, wrapping your legs around it tightly in order to keep from falling. A few minutes later, you were on top of your bag just as the sun had fully set. You spent a moment to catch your breath before feeling around for the zipper. Pulling it just enough to squeeze though you made your way inside and quietly wrapped yourself with a spare sock you had inside. There seemed to be enough things in the bag that you could safely climb back out in the morning, but for now, you could only lay here in waiting. With nothing else to do at your size, you decided to get some rest and hope tomorrow would be your lucky day.
153.title: Seeking Shelter in your Bag

1531.content: With the help of a friendly Pidgotto, you move your pack into the woods, where you start exploring. You watch a pair of Mankey beat the living snot out of each other, and a Metapod evolve into a Butterfree. You see that it's getting late, so your head into your pack. But before you could go to sleep, you hear footsteps. Before you could do anything, the pack was knocked over, and you see a(pack in the case of Poochyena)...
1531.title: The next day you head out and explore

15312.content: You feel a bit of fear as the female Rockruff stood over you. She lowered her head, sniffing at your body. Then sitting down, she said...
15312.title: Rockruff

1532.content:
For the most part, you manage to relax for the night in spite of all that happened to you earlier. The sock was quite comfortable and certainly kept you warm through the dark night. Suddenly you were awakened to everything around you shaking. At first you though there was an earthquake going on. But soon you heard movement outside. Footsteps. Someone or something clearly found your bag and was trying to inspect it. In the process they were jostling the contents, including you, all around. Fearing that another such incident would end with you being buried, you quickly tried to climb out, but soon froze as the top of the bag was opened.

There looking in was the face of a wild Pokémon. A very very big face of an even more massive Pokémon. Of course if you weren’t so tiny you’d probably consider your new “friend” to be...
1532.title: Something Finds your Bag

15321.content:
(I apologize for the brief choice chapter. Just trying to leave the story open for a few extra possibilities out of the 700+ monsters we have to choose from.)

Looking up you saw the relatively cute face of an otherwise small Pokémon looking in. Of course from your point of view this thing was anything but small. You were probably roughly compared to it now how it was to you before you shrank.
But what was it?
15321.title: Something small

153211.content:
Poking its head into your bag was a cute ‘little’ vulpix. The creature seemed curious by the abandoned bag and was poking through it to see if there was anything interesting inside. You backed away from the fox creature, but this only managed to catch its attention as it’s eyes immediately locked onto you. “Shit!” You muttered as you tried to hide under a shirt, but it did you little good as the creature effortlessly pulled your cover away leaving you exposed once more.

“Go away!” You shouted up at the otherwise cute giant, but it didn’t listen. It just stared at you curiously wondering why a human was so tiny. Before you could hide again (not that it would matter) the vulpix leaned down and grabbed you in its mouth. You shouted and squirmed in its grasp, but your actions were ultimately futile as you were pulled out of your bag and dropped onto the grassy ground by the creatures brownish paws. Looking up you saw that the giant was...
153211.title: A curious vulpix

choices: The Vulpix was taking you to his newly-made den
The Vulpix was taking you to show off to his family
The Vulpix decided he likes how you taste
1532111.content:
After being dropped to the ground your gaze landed on its vast red-brown underbelly and you quickly took note of a fuzzy sheath sitting between its thighs. The Vulpix was a male, though you weren't sure if that information could possibly help you at the moment. Besides that, the only other information that was running through your head was how you were too small to possibly get away from him or how easily you fit into his mouth. Still, nothing helpful.

His curious brown eyes were boring into you from above and you got startled as he lowered his head down to meet you. Instinctively you covered yourself with your arms and flinched as his cold nose nudge against you while it sniffed you. When it stopped you lowered your arms a little while the Vulpix simply regarded you, as if it was uncertain what to do with the miniature human he found. An ear of his drooped to the side for a moment before standing to attention again as it presumably came to a conclusion. Giving you no time to think, he reached down and grabbed you in his mouth again.

You were tossed about as the Vulpix tried to fit you comfortably into its mouth and eventually your body was splayed across his flat tongue. There was little to no room and you could barely move a muscle as he held parts of your body down with pointed teeth. You let your body go limp as the Vulpix kept you pinned, desperately hoping he wasn't thinking of pressing those teeth down and chewing you up. For a while it felt like he was just tasting you and carefully moving you around his mouth until you began to feel gravity gently bobbing you up and down. His jaws parted for just a moment long enough to confirm that he was definitely on the move.

If all goes well he won't eat you and decide to take you somewhere, somewhere you can hopefully find some type of solution to this crazy situation you found yourself in.

After a while of waiting you eventually find that...
1532111.title: A Curious Vulpix

15321112.content:
Waiting in the jaws of the Vulpix for who knows how long, you were eventually released onto warm solid ground. Wiping some of the excess saliva off yourself, you sat up and quickly tried to gain your bearings in the new unknown environment. From what you could see there were tree roots poking through a hard-pressed dirt roof in what seemed to be like an underground den of sorts. A fair amount of light was reflecting through the entrance which led to the surface, though at your stature the small incline was comparable to a large, steep hill.

More pressing, however, was how the amount of big brown paws surrounding you appeared to have doubled. From your low point of view you found yourself looking up at the two similar-looking Vulpix with their cheeks pushed against each other as they regarded you with curious fascination. The second one almost seemed in awe with how its jaws were parted slightly. The sight would have been cute if not for the terrible size difference. Averting your eyes from their gaze you decided to take a peak of the new Vulpix's underbelly. It lacked the equipment the boy Vulpix had so you could assume that this one was a female.

Suddenly, a noise from behind startled you. It sounded like an amused hum and it caught the attention of the two curious Vulpix who were now looking up at something. Almost afraid of what you would see, you hesitantly turned around to the source of the noise. What you saw was a towering form of yellow fur looming over you. You weren't sure how it avoided your perception because in comparison to the two Vulpix, this Pokemon was utterly massive!

Two slender arms were crossed against a fluffy chest as it was laying on the ground. Its vulpine head was proudly held high and you found yourself craning back just so you could look up at the underside of its pointed muzzle. From how its face was angled you could only just see a red eye and white pupil looking down at you, and from how its mouth was angled into a small grin it was undoubtedly very amused at seeing you. You recognized that this Pokemon was the evolution of the Vulpix that captured you, a Ninetales. Just past the bulk of its form you could see the mass of fluffy tails sitting idly.

As if it was waiting for you to notice it, the Ninetales began to move. Those arms it was keeping crossed at its chest rose over you until they were splayed out to the either side of you. With the two Vulpix on one side and the rest of the Ninetales on the other, its arms effectively walled you in as it moved its face down closer to you, still holding that amused smile.

You weren't sure what to do. Or rather, if there was anything you could do at this point in time. What you assumed was the parent of the Vulpix duo looked very interested in the small human that was sitting in the middle of its den. Escape seemed impossible.

After a brief silence, the fox Pokemon began to speak.
15321112.title: Introductions to the family

1532112.content: You blush slightly once you realize it was a she. Vulpix lowered her head down, and you flinch and close your eyes, expecting the fox to chomp down. But instead, you feel a hot tongue slide across your body. Vulpix sat back, licking her lips before saying...
1532112.title: Female

15321122.content: You found yourself getting bigger, Vulpix's eyes glowing blue. Terror filled you as Vulpix lunged forward and clamped her maw on your feet, her heated tongue running over your heel and between your toes. "Try and flee, there is no escape for you, your trainer days are over," she said as she sucked in a portion of your legs. You knew it was pointless to tell her you weren't a trainer, and just tried to escape. Vulpix just growled at this and swallowed again, taking in your ass and hands, pinning your arms to your sides. She lifted you up, smirking at your struggles as she ran her tongue over your ass. "What's wrong, can't take the heat? This is nothing, you are going to melt like ice cream in my belly," she proclaimed as she took in your belly. This fact renewed your struggles, which unfazed Vulpix. She swallowed again, taking in your chest. She purred happily as she ran her tongue over your flesh. With another gulp, your head was in her maw. Vulpix slowly licked your face before gulping down your head. She belched and licked her lips while rubbing her gurgling gut. A few minutes later, Vulpix belched again and stood up, her rear plump.
15321122.title: I think I found lunch

153212.content: It was a pokemon from that electric mouse family. You could see that it was!
153212.title: Pikachu family

choices: Pichu was friendly, she decided to keep you as her little friend
Pichu mischievously decided you were going to be a great toy...
Pichu decided she enjoyed your taste...
1532121.content:
From the looks of the Pokemon that was towering over you, you could easily tell what it was. It was a rather common Pokemon, member of one of the cutest evolutionary lineage.

Big, pointy ears that didn't seem fit on the small head, a small yellow body with tiny stubby paws and small, three-toed feet, with a short black tail sticking from behind the creature that you identified as Pikachu's pre-evolution, Pichu.

Everything seemed average about the small fella, except it wasn't small at all.

Currently, the cute yellow mouse was about the size of Reshiram to you, giving you an idea of just how small you had gotten.

The 'tiny' Pokemon stared at you, curiosity in its eyes.

"Pi-chu?" it said, blinking twice as it examined you. Its tone sounded feminine, though you still couldn't really tell what gender this Pichu was.

That could easily be fixed though. A quick glance downwards and...

You looked away blushing. There, now you knew this giant was actually a giantess. Good to know.

The Pichu finally made a move.

One of her dainty feet rose as she took a short step towards you, before her small legs began bending.

You saw the small giantess lowering down, one paw extended.

You realized too late she was going to grab you, and were soon grabbed in that same paw of hers.

Pichu rose back to her short, full height and looked at you some more, perhaps trying to figure what you were or, more probably, trying to figure what was a shrunken human doing at her feet.

Either way, it didn't matter. You were surely worth her attention.

You watched with a mix of dread and curiosity as the giantess examined you attentively.

"Chu?" she murmured, before moving you closer to her lips.

Something pink and slimy came out of Pichu's mouth and made contact with you as she gave a good, long lick across your whole body, leaving it coated in a thin layer of saliva.

You were grossed out, but the fear of what this giantess could be up to was stronger than disgust.

You shot the Pichu a look of dread, discovering she was staring back at you, this time with a grin.

You could only wonder what was running in her head right now...
1532121.title: Tiny Titan

choices: Another Pokémon had appeared—an enemy or friend?
15321211.content:
You soon discovered your fears were unfounded. Instead of harming you in some way, Pichu began squeaking happily, and brought you to her face, gently nuzzling you with her snout. You froze up at first, but then breathed a sigh of relief. The young giantess was friendly.

After a little bit of nuzzling, the massive rodent held you out in front of her face, smiling widely. She talked to you, but of course, you couldn’t understand her language, so you just nodded slowly as she talked. She stopped eventually, then abruptly stuck out her tongue and gave your face one quick lick of affection, before hugging you to her furry chest and starting to walk through the forest.

You tried to squirm in her arms, since she was holding you quite tightly, but she didn’t let you budge, so you quickly gave up. You simply settled in and tried to get comfortable. This was pretty easy, thanks to the warm and soft chest behind you, and the warm and soft arms in front of you. In fact, you quickly realized that it felt great to be held by this giant Pokémon. You even started to smile as you nestled into her fluffy grasp.

However, you hoped you wouldn’t be stuck like this forever. As comfortable as it was to be held like this, you were still the size of a Joltik, or perhaps even smaller. At this size, anything could be a danger. Plus, Pichu was one of the weakest species of Pokémon, so your new friend wouldn’t be able to protect you if a hostile Pokémon attacked. As such, you knew it would be important to figure out a way to return to your regular size.

And so, as the young yellow giantess carried you along, you spent your time thinking about possible ways to return to normal.

Eventually, Pichu stopped walking and started speaking in her unintelligible language again. You looked up and realized…
15321211.title: Friendly Pichu

choices: "Pika pi?" It said, though it hadn't noticed you.
"Pika pi?" It said as it was looking right at you!
"A...tiny human?" It was looking at you and sounded female.
"A...tiny human?" It was looking at you and sounded male.
1532122.content:
You looked at the looming form of the Pikachu as you tried to make yourself smaller. The Pikachu however didn't seem to notice you as it rummaged through your pack, looking for food you surmised. You tried to avoid its mighty paw as it moved objects around, but it seemed to be shaking your surroundings, almost like you were in an earthquake.

It seemed to find something it wanted though as a red shiny apple was lifted into the air, you sighed with relief as you weren't crushed by the Pikachu finding food, and you heard a *CRUNCH* as it took a bite.

You looked up at the Pikachu, finding yourself in its line of sight, you looked around looking for another place to hide when you heard it speak.
1532122.title: Pikachu

choices: It's glaring at you...and its cheeks are sparking!
It's opening its mouth...and moving you towards it!
15321222.content:
The Pikachu blinked as it looked at you. "Pi? Pika?" It said confused as it brought its head closer, and you fell on your butt, trying to scoot away as its face entered your pack. You gulped, wondering if it planned to eat you...but you found yourself pinned down by a nose as the Pikachu sniffed at you. You couldn't move, though you did squirm around a bit before you heard the Pikachu exclaim. "Pika!" It pulled away from you and you sighed, only to find that a giant paw was coming down on you!

You hoped that it wasn't going to crush you, but instead the paw wrapped around you tightly as your were lifted out of your pack, up and up to the Pikachu's face as it dropped the apple, now more interested in you.
15321222.title: Discovered by Pikachu

153212222.content:
After eyeing you curiously for about a minute or so, you noticed Pikachu started to smile down at you. This filled you with relief at first but then you saw that glint in its eyes. That mischievous little look it was giving you. You quickly realized your error and started to back up, but the massive yellow rodent was way faster than you, even at normal size. The giant humored you briefly, letting you back up and run but within seconds, you felt a heavy paw crashing down on top of you.

Pikachu grinned even more as it kept its prize trapped under its dirty front paw. You struggled and called up either for help or for mercy from your tormentor but neither came. Pikachu had captured the tiny human and it fully intended to keep this prize. As the paw finally lifted up, you rolled over seeing the giant mouse standing over you with the same grin. As your eyes wandered you spotted the creature’s tail, noticing that it was...
153212222.title: It's smiling mischievously at you

1532122221.content:
The tip of the yellow mouse's tail was straight and normal, letting you know the giant pikachu was male. It didn't matter however, you were about to become this pikachu's toy if you didn't run, and that is what you did.

You ran as fast as you could, but the pikachu was even faster as he used the move paralysis on you to keep you paralyzed and keep you from running from him. He then walked over to you and prepared to ----- on you, as you couldn't even move to avoid it.
1532122221.title: Male

15321222211.content:
The large Pikachu came closer to you and stood over you, giving you a nice view of its giant round butt. Pikachu would then drop down to the ground, sitting on you with such force. There was also no way to wiggle out or even struggle, so you had to hope the electric rat didn't try kill you as he started grinding his big yellow butt on you hard.

"Pika Pika!" You could hear him say under his big butt as he was grinding it nonstop. He was easily dominating you by butt smothering alone as it felt like his yellow wall was putting more pressure on you, however it wasn't enough to kill you even though it was getting even more harder to breath.

It would then that the Pikachu would....
15321222211.title: Under the Electric Butt.

1532122222.content:
The tip of the giant mouse creature’s tail had the familiar heart shape on the end signifying that your captor was female. Not that this mattered to you right now. Male or female, this monster rodent was clearly not going to help you. “Stay back!” You called out to her. “I have pokeball on me and i’ll capture you if you don’t leave me alone!” This was only a bluff, but unfortunately Pikachu saw right through it as she leaned in closer with an intimidating smirk. “L-last chance. Leave or you’ll be trapped in the ball forever.” Your voice didn’t have an ounce of bravado in it and Pikachu could see that you didn’t have anything on you, including clothes. Unless you stored really tiny pokeballs inside your body, you were a hilariously bad liar here. But since none of your possessions seemed to shrink with you, Pikachu was easily able to see through your bluff.

The mouse took a deep breath before blowing air at you. The resulting gust was powerful enough to knock you back on your ass as the Pikachu’s laughter boomed from above. You looked around desperately for any shelter. But where could you even go? Not bothering to think any further you tried to get back up and bolt for your bag. It might not keep Pikachu away, but at least it would prolong this a bit and hopefully give someone or something else a chance to show up and chase the Pikachu off. However as you started to sprint, you saw a shadow eclipse the sun, covering you in darkness as Pikachu’s massive _______ fell on top of you.
1532122222.title: Female Pikachu

choices: Pikachu eventually let you out!... To ‘play’ something else of course...
Actually, you felt pretty good in there... Pikachu let you stay longer...
15321222222.content:
With confusion rapidly spreading from the depths of your mind like an ink stain, you glanced backwards, wondering what the giantess you ran into was up to.

A single glimpse of the giant rodent was enough to tell you what was happening, and it was more than enough to get you to fasten your desperate sprint.

But it wasn't the face of the yellow giantess you saw approaching like in slow motion, no; it was, much to your desperation and disgust, the giantess' rear end!

That's right.

The heart-shaped tail wagged in anticipation; from your angulation, you could see very clearly a pink, wrinkled hole at the base of the tail itself, but that was not all.

Your gaze landed on a thin, pink slit buried beneath the yellow fur, invisible to anyone but you, whose new size allowed you to see things from a very different perspective.

Fear moving you like a puppet master would with a marionette, you let out a startled scream while the shadow around you grew larger and larger.

In desperation, you gazed back at the thing you were trying to hide in - your bag. It wasn't so far, you could make it!

You could make it!

You could make it!

You could make it!

...

The shadow grew dangerously large and the air began carrying a very sweet scent mixed with a truly hideous stench.

You were not going to make it...

You closed your eyes and gritted your teeth, bracing yourself for the impact that was going to send you straight in the cold embrace of death.

The inevitable happened. The impact came.

The sweet from the air faded, leaving only a disgusting smell assaulting your nose. You didn't find the courage to open your eyes - this must have been what hell smelt like. It was utterly weird: your upper body was in a warm, moist and squishy place while your lower felt weightless and cold. Was this what hell was like?

Just as you were wondering what did you do in life to deserve all of this, a deep moan resonated around,

"Piii..."

Your eyes opened instantly as your fears of being crushed turned out to be unwarranted.

Still, it didn't mean your situation wasn't one to dread.

Urgently, you realized that you had gone straight up that hole you had been gazing at earlier, and that it was slowly consuming you!

All around you, the voice of the Pikachu echoed blissfully as she moaned in pleasure.

"... H-Hey!" you screamed, the hideous smell violating your mouth too as your legs beginning flailing helplessly outside of the anus,
"Let me out!"

The response of the rodent was another moan. This wasn't her original plan, but it felt wonderful!

Moaning blissfully as she sat on the grassy forest floor, the yellow mouse clenched her anus, causing more of you to be sucked inside of her.

Desperation overtook you.

In an attempted to push yourself back out, you tried to grip the slick, fleshy floor of the inside of Pikachu's rear, but the walls were far too slick and your hands slid off.

It was like the rectum itself was trying to stop any progress; it was like a ravenous, perverted beast, trying to feed on you, knowing that it would bring great pleasure to its master, who in turn showed no signs of wanting to let you out of your new, cruel and smelly entrapment.

Your waist was sucked up too, the Pikachu's moans causing the slick walls to vibrate while her butt-hole consumed you.

Clench-unclench, clench-unclench, clench-unclench, like a powerful Arbok's maw would with a yummy but way-too-big prey.

You were up your knees now, and all hope was beginning to wane just like the clean air from your lungs, which was rapidly being replaced with the rank smell of the rectum, which was oddly breathable. You didn't know if to take that as a blessing or a curse.

"Pi! Pika!" moaned your captor from outside.

The yellow mouse was ecstatic right now; her tail swinged back and forth, her feet flailed and her tiny fists clenched while a blush spread across her already red cheeks.

"C-Chu..." she moaned again, feeling more of the body of her human prey slide into her rectum.

She didn't care how the critter got so small nor if he needed any help; perhaps she was going to take a better look at them later, but for now she wasn't going to let this opportunity go.

She was going to get to the bottom of this.

And speaking of bottom...

"Piii-ka..." she moaned one last time, clenching her butt-hole as she felt the human's feet slide inside.

Her anus opened and closed repeatedly after the sudden insertion, as if rejecting its latest ‘meal’; but, as Pikachu began growing used to the foreign feeling of having something - or rather someone - up her butt, her hole clenched for the last time, before closing definitely.

Her prey was consumed.

--

Darkness.

Darkness was all you could see, meaning that you couldn't actually see anything. The smell burned stung your nose, burned your eyes, violated your mouth. If possible, you were quite sure it was crawling its way into your ears.

But the smell was only the tip of the iceberg.

The heat was unbearable, the rectum awfully tight; the rectal muscles clenched around you quite hard, the Pikachu moaning in sheer bliss

Wishing to get out as soon as you could, you tried to crawl around to get back to the anus, but every little movement you made caused the muscles to clamp down on you.

Insteat of getting closer to the way you came in, you urgently discovered, you were being dragged even deeper inside the smelly cave!

The sticky, slick and squishy flesh even rubbed against a certain, exposed organ of yours, causing it to-

You blushed furiously - your were growing aroused!?

Wondering what's gotten into you, you doubled the efforts to try to crawl back to the anus, your squirming making the giant rodent you were trapped in moan harder, but not allowing you to make any progress.

You sighed in defeat as you laid into the tight rectum, realizing that there was no way out of her unless Pikachu was willing it.

If she ever willed it...

153212222221.content:
Your fate was directly tied to the Pikachu’s whims. You had no way of escaping and by now any attempts at movement at all were thwarted by the walls closing in around you. You were stuck here, with no light and just the overpowering heat and smells of Pikachu’s cavern to set off your senses at all. On the outside you occasionally heard Pikachu moaning or making other sounds as the walls rubbed against your naked body some more. You had given up on resisting them by now. Even if you hadn’t you didn’t have the strength left to try. In the complete darkness, you had absolutely no sense of time whatsoever. You could have been in here for several days, or maybe it was just an hour. You thankfully didn’t have to share your space with any of Pikachy’s past meals so you had one small blessing to count in this absolute hell of a life you were trapped in as a giant rodent’s butt toy.

All of a sudden the walls closed in more. You felt a strong pressure building above your head. You dreaded that you were about to lose that single blessing right then and there, but you soon noticed this was differant. Nothing come or pressed against you. Well nothing solid at least. Instead all you get with the pressure growing stronger. The walls and muscles seemed to be changing. Now they seemed to be pushing you back towards the exit rather than deeper into her rectum. Was she about to let you out?

Back outside, Pikachu had grabbed your bag and taken it and you to a secluded area of the woods. No predators would reach the two of you here, making this the perfect place to enjoy her new toy. Getting into position, the yellow rodent grunted as she tried to force the passenger out of her. A small fart sounded as a bit of the air forced its way outside while she tried to get the rest of the contents back out.

A loud noise erupted around you causing the walls to vibrate. What would otherwise be a small fart was completely earth shattering to you. The foul stench managed to get even worse, but you quickly noticed the silver lining as you get a cold breeze reach your feet. You were starting to exit her rear. Maybe she was planning something but anything was preferrable to being trapped in here as far as you cared.

Pikachu let out a quick gasp as she felt your tiny form beginning to poke its way out of her. The feeling was unlike anything she had ever experienced before. So so tingly, so relieving, so wonderful. A blush formed as she felt you wiggle a bit once more, presumably from the first fart hitting you. Slowly she felt the hole widen as the rest of your body was forced out of it, needing to compensate for your size.

More of your body felt the comforting breeze of the outside world. The chill was definitely comforting compared to the overwhelming heat from within your captress. Finally you were ejected from your prison, gasping for fresh air, though it was still prettty tainted by the stenches escaping her ass along with you. As you laid beneath her you saw the hole closing up, thankful that you were watching this from the outside this time around. The hole shifted away as the massive Pikachu turned around to see her catch. At first she seemed a little embarrassed at everything that just transpired, but then she started to grin. You had no clue what was going on before you followed her eyes and noticed that you still had an erecting from all the grinding. Ohhh crap. You quickly try to cover it up but the mouse easily pushes them aside and kept them pinned with a finger as she examines your embarrassing stiffy. Did her pet enjoy his little ride. Or maybe something else set this off. Whatever the reason, she was going to enjoy this.
153212222221.title: Pikachu eventually let you out

Pikachu placed you at her feet...
1532122222212.content:
Pikachu's rather sinister grin - as well as her blush - widened as all sorts of scenarios began springing up into her mind, one after another.

But since you seemed to like her butt so much...

You didn't like the sight of the Pikachu grinning at you like that, it only served to let you know that she was up to something which, contrary to what your crotch was telling you, you knew you weren't going to enjoy.

"Pi..." the giantess hinted mischievously while she slowly pulled back, freeing your arms from the grip of her fingers while standing back on her stubby feet and moving backwards.

You stared at the rodent giantess, trying to figure out what she was up to while also trying to figure a way to get away from her.

You looked around, but all you could see were trees and bushes. If only you could dig your way underground or hide in between some roots, maybe you could-

"Pika!" your captor exclaimed, causing you to snap back to attention and look at her again... only to notice she was no longer staring at you.

Or better, she was, but you quickly noted that her face and head had, once more, risen to heavens while you were left staring at a familiar, heart-shaped tail and a wrinkled hole...

"No!" you exclaimed while the giantess, noticing she had your attention again, began to lower her rear back on you again.

Lest you were going to end up getting pushed up Pikachu's behind again, you tried to back off while the humongous rear descended towards you.

No no no, not again, not again...

You hastily tried to stand back up to run and avoid the incoming butt, but the furry behemoth was far too fast for you. Like t did before, the shadow grew larger as it approached your small body.

Before you even knew it, the rear came back on you once more, once again assaulting your nose with that hideous smell from before mixed with the sweet scent of the Pikachu.

For a moment, you could see your own self being sucked up inside Pikachu's bottom for the second time in less than an hour, but you realized it was just your imagination.

You opened your eyes, noticing you were snugly wedged between the giantess' butt and nethers, which dripped with anticipation on your lower body.

The pressure you were being subjected to wasn't enough to kill you, but was far more than enough to keep you in place and unable to move while all your senses were overwhelmed; all you could see, hear, feel and smell was the bottom of the rodent, who wiggled her butt in place, her tail wagging happily.

Pikachu moaned a deep ‘Chaaa’ of satisfaction - her latest catch made a great cushion for her behind, which was used to the hard, cold forest floor.

Not that it made any difference, but it still felt quite good to have something so small under there. Not to mention it was quite... arousing.

Pikachu could feel every little movement you made, and she loved the sensation she got from it; you struggled, an electric shock traveled across her body, causing her tail to stop in place and her ears to shiver, her body to quiver and crotch to pulse.

For a split second, she felt concerned lest, if she was pleasured too much she'd let out a massive amount of electricity, frying her little pet alive; but her worry was soon replaced by pleasure again as the human beneath her butt kept uselessly struggling to get free.

As the yellow giantess grew aroused, you noted the weird mix of horrible and sweet scents growing stronger along with your captor's arousal, working its way in your system through your mouth, which you tried to keep shut close, not wanting it anywhere near the Pikachu's bottom, and your nose.

The sickening sweet of her nethers and the horrible, unbearable smell of her bottom invaded your nostrils, though the bad smell was a little stronger due the farts the rodent had let out before when she let you out of her.

You tried to scream for the yellow giantess to let you out, but as soon you opened your mouth, it was invaded by the yellow fur of her bottom.

"Mhhh!" your muffled scream echoed under the Pikachu as you spat out the fur, disgusted, your mouth violated and your stomach twisting violently at the idea of what just entered your oral cavity.

The giantess whose butt you were trapped under giggled, enjoying the activity of the little human in his current, cruel entrapment.

Her cheeks grew redder than they already were as she let a small, nearly inaudible fart slip out, straight on your body.

You coughed as the foul stench assaulted you point blank, burning your eyes and stinging your nose.

This only caused you to double the efforts to break free, but you struggled uselessly against the giantess' butt; might as well try to fight a legendary barehanded, you mused, but you had to try.

If the giantess felt annoyed enough, she was going to stand up; punish you for sure, but anything was better than this!... Except maybe for a trip to her stomach, which would be much worse than your current situation.

Little you did know, Pikachu was nowhere near to being annoyed; it was the exact opposite, your squirming only made her moan in pleasure as you tickled her sensible butt and crotch, which began growing wetter each minute that passed.

Soon, the smell the giantess began growing so strong that you could no longer bear it; it crawled its way inside your lungs, causing your eyes to water in disgust.

If Pikachu didn't stand up soon, you were going to pass out, and who knew what she'd do to you then...

Luckily, your prayers were soon answered.

You felt the pressure around you waning all of a sudden; the smell lingered around you for a second, like a powerful aura, before it was blown away by a cool breeze, allowing you to breathe air. Normal, fresh, wonderful air!

Your relief was however short-lived as the yellow rodent you were apparently stuck with once more filled your whole view with her entire, towering being.

Startled, you tried to back off, but you lacked enough strength to do so; and it was so that Pikachu could easily grab you and sit back down where you once were, grinning at you.

"Pika-chaa!" she chimed, though you couldn't understand her.

"P-please... just let me go..." you begged, not caring if it meant being alone, lost and eventually at the mercy of some other giant pokemon.

Sadly, the electric rodent had no intention of letting you go, and she expressed it with another grin appearing on her frightening - though admittedly cute - face while she giggled lowly, suggesting you what Pikachu was thinking.

The fun had only just begun.

15321222223.content:
Just like in any movie, time seemed to slow down as the shadow around you became larger. However, you were well aware that it was in reality just something above drawing nearer, and you knew that 'something' had a heart-shaped tail and yellow fur.

An instant before the impact, you turned around to see the Pikachu giantess carelessly dropping tummy-down towards where you were standing, arms spread wide.

You opened your mouth to scream. And, the moment you did, a yellow monolith came crashing down upon you.

The scream never left your mouth, silenced by a mouthful of yellow fur.

Your eyes opened, and you wondered if you were still alive. You assumed you were, since you could still feel the immense pressure you were being subjected to. You could feel that pretty well, actually.

Yellow fur was the only you could see, feel, smell, taste. It was a miracle you had survived the impact.

Perhaps this new size of yours rendered you more sturdy, but you had no wish to stay here more and find out the practical way.

You had to get out of here, though it would be no simple task: you couldn't move properly, and could barely even breathe. If your stay under the Pikachu's belly would grow prolonged, then you weren't going to get out from under it alive.

You could feel the electricity in the air, emanated by the same fur of the giantess. Of course, there was a good risk she'd to give you a playful shock, frying you alive. That was the worst case scenario, which, you decided, you didn't want to think about.

Without many options at you disposal, you did the only thing you could do right now: you began squirming.

You weren't quite sure where this would bring you. Surely not out of here, though it was worth a shot. Maybe you were going to annoy the rodent giantess so much she was going to let you out in the end.

Sadly, the outcome was the exact opposite.

The giantess you were trapped beneath, she suddenly felt a tickle under her belly.

It wasn't hard to figure out what was happening.

The Pikachu smiled, the began giggling as she felt the sensation growing the more the human under her tummy squirmed to get free.

Of course, with him being stranded in the middle of her belly, the effort was quite pointless; not only that, he was pinned between her belly and the grass which, albeit saving his life from the impact he received, also kept him from getting away. Which was pretty good, since Pikachu had no intention of letting you go anytime soon, if she was going to let you go at all.

She doubted she wanted to. And why should have she? Humans kept Pokemon as pets all the time, what was the harm if the roles were swapped for just one time?

The thought made Pikachu's smile grow wider.

The tickle grew stronger as you squirmed more and more, and the urge to flip on her back grew just as strong, though Pikachu was able to keep herself from accidentally freeing you.

However, your squirming soon came to an end, when you realized that it was bringing you nowhere. It wasn't exactly surprising to you, but it was still disappointing.

You had to get out another way, or you were going to run out of air under here, risking death from asphyxiation.

You gritted your teeth.

You really had to stop thinking about your potential deaths, because all it did was daunt you.

Instead of lingering on such line of thinking, you focused more on how to get out of this situation.

If only you could shift on your belly so you could try to crawl out of here, that'd be great.

So, you began squirming again, this time to get on down on your stomach.

This time, your efforts were paid.

You managed to move on your belly, though the hardest part had yet to come.

With your elbows on the ground, you tried to lift the tons of heavy yellow fur with your back. You needed to in order to crawl away.

It took an immense effort to lift the belly of the Pikachu a little bit, and it was even harder to crawl an inch forward.

After a while of doing this, you could feel your elbows hurting, and you were not even sure of how much progress you had made.

As for Pikachu, she was not amused anymore.

Your movements underneath her were barely felt now, and she was growing bored.

It had been more fun when she felt you struggling, tickling her, but now...

Despite the awkward situation, a grin crawled across Pikachu's face as she figured this was only the tip of the iceberg. She was going to have much more fun with her little catch later on, she mused, because he was not going anywhere.

With those thoughts in mind, Pikachu placed her stubby, yellow arms on the grass and proceeded to stand up.

Sunlight showered you, and your body was relieved of all pressure while fresh air started penetrating your nostrils and mouth.

You took in deep mouthfuls of air, before turning your head to see a large yellow foot beside you; craning your head, you saw the smiling face of its owner as she stared you down, ears twitching in excitement.

"Okay, what was that about?" you asked, a bit irritated, though careful to watch your tone around a being that could end your life with a motion of her pinky toe.

It looked like she understood you, because she suddenly fell on all fours, sending a tremor strong enough to knock you on your rear.

Then, before you could move, she brought her face dangerously close to where you were sitting and opened her mouth to reply,
15321222223.title: Smooth trap

153213.content:
You watched as the top your bag opened, letting a pair of blue lake-sized eyes enter your sight. They were surrounded by black fur, and you could distinctly see the face of the pokemon as it entered your bag.

It was a Zorua.

Yep, it was really the ‘little’ illusion fox, and it was searching inside your bag, hoping to find anything that could amuse it.

And it definitely did.

Despite you doing your best to hide under your sock, the Zorua's eyes locked on you; evidently, it could see clearly even in the darkness of the bag.

You made eye contact with it for full five seconds, before you heard and saw it snickering down at you, before its muzzle left the bag.

You wondered what it was up to, but couldn't think about it for too long.

Vibrations.

Your whole, improvised shelter shook, and you felt tremors everywhere; your stuff went flying in all directions while you were ungracefully thrown back and forth within the confines of the bag.

But it was just a minute, before you roughly landed, your bag fallen on a side.

You stumbled back on your feet, wondering what just happened, and began walking to the opening of the bag to get out.

It was probably unsafe out there, but you felt in need of fresh air, which seemed to currently lack inside of the bag.

Dizzily, you walked out of your own bag and inhaled deeply as you took a look around the forest where you shrunk.

Your eyes shot open as what little amount of air you managed to inhale was forced out of your lungs.

Since when the sky was red and the clouds black? And where was the Zorua?

In confusion, you began stumbling around, not believing what you were seeing.

You felt more and more confused as you kept walking in circles, trying to figure out was going on.

But suddenly, the grass around you sprang to life as it began moving. Blades of grass wrapped around your wrists and ankles, entangling you. You screamed in terror as you began struggling to break free, but the grass was too strong for you to fight back.

It coiled around your waist and neck, like a hungry Arbok would with its meal. You uselessly tried to break free, but the the grass didn't relent. At some point though, it finally loosened a bit, and you took the opportunity to finally free your arms and legs, before using them to free the rest of your body and starting to run off in a fear.

Just what was happening!? Was your shrinking bad enough!? Now nature itself was trying to kill you!

You ran aimlessly, just trying to get away from the grass, when you bumped into a soft yet firm wall that caused you to be sent flying backwards.

You painfully landed on your back and dizzily looked up, your vision blurry.

As it cleared though, you noticed that the sky and clouds were back to normal... weird.

And what did you bump into? You were sure that there wasn't anything where you-

A somewhat familiar snicker interrupted your train of thought; you sat up, noticing the giant figure of a black fox staring straight at you, a mischievous grin on its face.

The Zorua you met before! The nasty fox just pranked you by scaring the hell out of you!

"Hey!" you cried in anger, and a bit of fear, though mostly anger.

But the Zorua simply shot the same grin again as it began walking towards you.

You anger waning, you tried to crawl backwards, away from the malicious fox, but it leaped in the air.

Curiously, as it did, you caught a glimpse of the pokemon's crotch... and blushed furiously as you noticed that this fox was, in reality, a vixen.

Stunned by the sight, you didn't realize until it was too late that th Zorua had leaped straight onto you!

Her red paw quickly pinned you down into the dirt while it caused you to scream in pain from the force of the impact. You felt like all your bones were about to snap like a bunch of matchsticks, but the Zorua didn't seem to care.

Instead, she began toying with your naked body under her paw for a bit, rolling you under her toes and paw-pad.

Only when you began to feel like you were being crushed by a heavy truck, the Zorua stopped to lower her face.

And, from her expression, you could tell what her intentions were.
153213.title: Victim of an illusion

1532131.content:
You coughed and sputtered as the Zorua lowered her face down to you, moving her paw off of you. You tried to crawl back, but you found that it proved impossible with how much pain you were in. You didn't think anything was broken, but she did a number on you just with her paw. You whimpered as you saw the face getting closer and closer, you laid back expecting the worse, but all you got was a soft chuckle from the giant pokemon as her warm breath washed over you.

"Oh wow, I got you good!" You heard her exclaim in an oddly feminine voice. Wait...you could understand her. "That look on your face when you came out of that bag! Ha!" She had an oddly friendly grin as she said all this, and she gave you a small smirk.

"Wh-w-" You were stuttering, and she lowered her face even more, that maw of her descending as you tried once again to crawl back, only to wince in pain.

"Whoa little guy, relax, i'm not gonna eat ya, I was just having some fun!" The Zorua said, stopping you with a paw, pinning you effectively, though much more gently.

"Why did you jump on me?" You asked, wincing and the Zorua grinned again.

"It sure scared you didn't it? Relax, I knew I wouldn't crush you, I was in complete control." She said and you groaned as your head rested against the cold ground, she felt you shudder and shiver a bit under her paw and lifted it again, bringing her muzzle down again.

"So what's the deal, i've never seen a human as tiny as you before, or one that could understand pokemon either, what happened?" She asked, curiosity in her eyes and you looked into those giant pools and shook your head.

"I...I don't know, I just woke up like this after getting dizzy and passing out. I hid in my bag when you came along..." You said and she nodded.

"Wow. That sucks." She nodded sympathetically.

It was then that her head rose higher and higher, up to her full height as you felt booms with her movement. She was walking away. You stammered a bit as this colossus was leaving you here! You looked to the distance as she moved, her pink slit in full view, you blushed, but cried out.

"W-wait!" You cried out between shivers and she stopped, looking at you.

"P-please don't l-leave me here..." You said, clearly cold and scared and she looked at you a bit sympathetically.

"What do you want me to do? I don't know what shrunk you." She said with a shrug and you looked at her.

"J-just help...p-please...i-if I stay here alone like this I-I might d-die..." You stammered out, almost crying. She sighed as she looked at you. You felt booms as her giant form came closer and closer, her face regarding you once more. She looked you over then spoke.
1532131.title: A harmless Zorua

15321311.content:
"Hmm... I really should help you, huh?" You vigorously nod and she tilts her head away, looking in your direction with one eye. "It'd be really nice of me, wouldn't it?" You can't handle it anymore, will she or won't she help you?! "Please, I'm begging you! Help me out here! I don't know this area, I-I don't know how long I can survive on my own!" Her face turns skyward as she gazes into the darkness, pondering her options. Dread washes over you as a familiar grin comes across her face, a mischievous look shines through her watery eyes as she stoops to your level. "Too bad I'm not that nice." The black fortress of fur raises her head and takes one massive step...

What? She's... leaving? Without you?! Your throat clogs up, but you manage to choke out a pathetic "But... I need help..." She turns her head toward you. "Yeah, well, good luck with that! You're not getting any help from this Pokemon." She pounds her chest for emphasis, obviously trying not to laugh, but abandoning the notion after a few short coughs devolve into a giggle fit, as if she couldn't get a hilarious idea out of her mind. "See ya!" With a swish of her tail, she takes off, fading away until all that remains is the faint sound of her snickering laugh. Alone again... You let your head sink back to the ground. What are you going to do now? She might've been your only salvation, and she just... abandoned you! And she seemed like an alright Pokemon, too... Maybe she just didn't want to deal with you... A freezing gust of wind blows over you, stinging your teary eyes. Can't do anything at night... You slowly pick yourself up and head back to your makeshift camp. Hopefully, it's still warm in there...
............................................................................ ................................................................................
Your ears and fingers are numb by this point, you didn't run this far away from the bag... Did you?
............................................................................ ................................................................................

However, you still haven't found any trace of your bag... Was it even in this direction?

Another gust of wind rushes over you, and with a gutteral noise, you pitch forward onto your face. Doesn't matter anymore. Your frozen muscles can't even lift your head up to look around. Some hiking trip this turned out to be...

"Oh, hi little guy! Didn't expect to see anyone your size tonight." Someone's talking... Female, you think. You try to respond, but only manage a weak "Gahh..." The voice returns, much closer now. "You've got some serious balls, sleeping out in open here, I almost stepped on you, y'know." As much as you try, you can't make any more noise. "You alright, dude? I'm still waiting for a response here..." You can suddenly see the starry sky again as you are flipped over. There's a shooting star... "Jeeez, you're dead cold, dude! You're not... actually dead, are you?! ...No, he's still breathing. But, shit, you really will die if I don't warm you up, quick!" You are then lifted into the air, past the waiting jaws of the...
15321311.title: "Hmm... good luck with that! See ya!"

She's taking you to her home where she lives with other pokemon
She's taking you to a pokemon that might be able to help you better than her

15321313.content:
"You really don't have any idea what happened to you?" She said, looming over you, her face eclipsing the light of the sky as her shadow was cast over you. You shivered more and shook your head.

She got a gentler look as she backed up, and then with a large boom laid down on the cold ground.

"Alright, climb on my back, i'll take care of your scrawny butt." You heard her say, though right now all you could see was her wall of fur that she wanted you to climb to get on her back. Even with her trying to make it easy for you it was a trek. With a shiver you approached her and reached out a hand, feeling her fur...it was warm, and soft. It instantly felt good on your hand.

"Wow, you are cold little guy." You heard her say, and even felt it through your contact with her, the slight movements of her body being all too noticeable at your scale. She must've been able to feel you better now as you firmly gripped her fur, getting ready to climb her.

You put both hands on her torso and started to make your ascent. You grunted, finding it at least easy to keep stable.

Zorua for her part was staying as still and patient as she could, though found it difficult. This tiny little thing was taking its time to simply get on her back. She sighed, not realizing that the simple exhale of air shook you around a bit, luckily you kept your grip as you clambered up, falling down into her fur, sweating slightly but still feeling cold.

Her fur instantly started to warm you as you sank into it, and you felt your stomach start to swim as Zorua stood up, almost like a rapid ascent on a roller coaster.

You turned your head to see the forest and then realized how high up you were...or really how tiny you were.

"Alright little dude, stick with me and things'll work out swimmingly...probably." Zorua said, grinning.

She'd definitely have her fun with this human too...though he didn't need to know that right now.

All you knew was that you were grateful. You weren't going to die. When she started moving though, the wind started to chill you once again, you swore it was going to be the end of you. You got down in the fur as much as possible, trying to shield yourself as best you could. The Zorua looked back, trying to see you.

"Hey uh...you gonna be alright? You're being quiet." She asked and you looked up from the fur, the wind stinging on your face.

"I'm c-cold Zorua...I a-appreciate t-this though...p-please just get m-me out of t-this..." You stuttered and she nodded.

"Don't worry, we ain't far from our destination." Zorua said.
15321313.title: Zorua decides to take you

153213131.content:
"Our destination is right around the corner, so try to keep your head down, aight." She told, gaining a bit more of speed.

You cling onto the Zorua's back and fur as much as possible, keeping your body warm enough to not freeze to death in the chilling wind.

Soon, you feel the Zorua slow down a little, and the wind stopped berating your body. You look up from the fur to see that your in a pretty dank cave. This must be where Zorua lives. You think, looking around the place.

"We're here!" Zorua exclaims, her echo bouncing throughout the cavern. "Home sweet home. You can climb down if you'd like."

You proceed to climb down off of Zorua's back, which is easier said than done. You promptly slide of the front paw of the Zorua, and ask, "So, do you live alone?"

"Yeah" She says, sadly looking down, the happily looks at you, "but at least you're here to keep me company, pal." You smile at that remark, knowing, without her, you wouldn't be here right now. You'd probably be frozen in the middle of the woods. "Yeah" You chuckle. "At least you're here with me."

She blushes at that remark, and turns to you, leaning toward your body. "So, do you want to play a game real quick, I promise it will be fun, dude."

You think about it for a second. You're pretty tired, but you can't really refuse her, after all she has done for you. You quickly decide your answer and say...
153213131.title: Home Sweet Home

1532132.content: Zorua licked her lips hungrily. Her eyes glowed and you found yourself growing. Zorua then darted her head forward and clamped her maw over your feet, running her tongue over your heels and between your toes. "Go on, try to escape. I like it when they try to escape my belly," she mentally taunted you as she sucked in more of your legs. You gasp in terror and try to extract your legs, but Zorua swallows again, taking in your rear. You wriggle in disgust as she ran her tongue over every square inch on your plump ass. Zorua snickered at your wriggles as she lifted you up, pulled in your arms, and flipped you around. "Keep squirming, you might just get free," she said before snickering. "Of course, if you do, then my ass will gladly end you," she snickered at your look of terror. "That's right, my ass loves a squirmy meal just as much as my belly," she said before swallowing again, taking in your gut. Zorua gently chewed on your gut, watching your struggles happily. She swallowed again, bring in your chest. Zorua snickered at the fear on your face as she slowly licked your chest. With another gulp, your head in Zorua's maw. The fox purred with glee as she licked your face before gulping you down. Zorua licked her lips and belched, snickering at your pathetic struggles. "Good pudge, I love it when they struggle and gurgle," she taunted. A few minutes later, Zorua belched again and got up, giving her plump rear a slap, and with another snicker, she was off.

You notice the red eyes and the light purple fur with a creme underside belonged to a Rattata. You should have thought of the possibility of one of them foraging through your backpack, since they are well known for doing so. Luckily, the Rattata hasn't realized that you are in the bag with it, though their body is blocking the exit. You watch it from your sock, as it eats all of your planned rations. That sucks a lot, but you need to not think on it now and try thinking on finding a way out of the pack, less you want to become a ration for the rat.

You see your chance of escaping when the Rattata began to inspect your portable radio, chewing on it. You slowly and quietly crawl out of your sock, standing up, and try to tip toe to the open zipper. As you're doing so, you look at the Rattata, making sure it's focus is still on the radio, when you look at it's backside. You see that the Rattata is a female, due to the slit underneath where it lays, and the fact that it's fur is light, rather than the bold color that the males have.

thonk

While thinking of the differences that male and female Rattata's have, you failed to notice the tail that was in your way, making you trip on it and land face first onto the ground. The Rattata turns around to see your small figure behind it, as she instinctively backs away. You soon recover from your trip, and look up to see the Rattata looking at you. You move backwards until your back is on a backpack wall. The Rattata then moves closer as she looks...

The Rattata quickly closes the gap between you and her, bringing her head right on top of you. Her hot breath wafts over you, making it hard to breath any fresh air. She brings her mouth right up close to you, as you close your eyes and brace yourself, expecting for her to chomp on your body like a raisin. Instead, you get a slimy muscle to the front, leaving a bit of you soaked.

You open your eyes to see the Rattata practically standing over you, sitting down as she says...
15321412.title: What are you?

153214122.content: Rattata didn't say anything, she could talk, but right not, she would enjoy digesting this human. Fear fills you as she licked her lips hungrily. Before you could react, you were enlarged a bit before she wrapped her tail around you, lifting you up. Fear runs through you when she opened her maw, telepathically saying, "wriggle for me." With that, she popped your feet into her maw, running her tongue over your heels and between your toes, smirking at your panicked struggles. How fitting, the 'useless' Rattata caught a human, and this human will be sludge, and then rat fat. She slurped down a portion of your legs, smirking as she felt your feet touch the back of the throat. "feel that? that's your demise," she taunted, slurping down the rest of your legs and taking in your rear end. You wriggle in disgust as her tongue got every inch of your ass. She swallowed again, flipping you over to lap at your belly, letting go with her tail. "So delicious, I think I found a new meal," she taunted as she swallowed again, taking in your chest. "Just a little bit more, then you will melt," she said, taking in your taste. Rattata swallowed again, taking in your head. The purple rat smiled as she slowly ran her tongue over your face before swallowing again, sending you to her belly. She belched and licked her lips, smiling at your pathetic struggled, your form melting. A few minutes later, Rattata belched again and stood up, giving her plump ass a shake before scampering off.

There looking down at you was the hungry face of a MASSIVE wild snorlax. Massive probably didn’t do justice to just how big the bear-like creature was to you though you could only see it’s round face, you could tell this was a terrifyingly massive Pokémon. It must have spotted your bag and assumed there was food inside. You froze in fear as you watched it inspecting the contents of its find before losing patience with this method and simply dumping the contents onto the ground where it could find what it wants faster and easier.

Before you could snap back from your fear induced paralysis, everything flipped upside down as you and everything around you came crashing down to the dirt below. Thankfully a spare shirt cushioned your fall. Unfortunately, you were now out in the open with no place to hide. As the massive creature reached for a sandwich next to you it stopped as it saw you moving. Puzzled and curious about the tiny thing that looked like a human.
Clearly it was very shocked to stop reaching for a free sandwich to inspect you. As you took a quick look you noticed the snorlax was...

From your point of view down below, you managed to inadvertently determine the gender of the fat, giant, bear creature before you. Spotting the creature’s penis in the corner of your eye as you looked up at it. Of course, your primary focus was less on his genitals and more towards the expression on his face and wether or not he would determine you to be food or not. Nervously taking a few steps back, the Snorlax didn’t speak or move. He just seemed to stand there contemplating this tiny naked human standing among the pile of food and clothes. It could tell by the size of the clothes around you that you weren’t naturally this small. But what should it do with you. Should it even bother with you? There’s a few days worth of food it could take and not worry about the human. After all, humans tend to lead to trouble for the lazy creature. Still, this one was intriguing.
Finally the creature tried to speak

"Snor" Yaaaawwn "Lax"

It seems that the large Snorlax forgot about you, and he started lying down on the ground. You know Snorlax's are heavy sleepers, so you could easily sneak away.

"Snor" Yaaaawwn "Lax"

Taking a look at the rest of the sleeping giant, you noticed that he was resting right next to your discarded bag, as if to guard its contents (your food) from anyone or anything else. Thankfully he didn’t seem to care much about your presence, though you noticed that you were starting to get pretty hungry. 153231122.title: Mind Wins Out

1532311223.content:
Before you could make up your mind, the sleeping beast’s loud snoring stopped. Initially you didn’t think too much about it, but that quickly changed when you saw him leaning up a bit and looking right at you. You stayed in place, hoping that any lack of activity from you would make the giant lose interest. This strategy quickly backfired as it gave the lazy beast the opportunity he needed to reach out and snatch you up. Though it was hardly a quick motion. He was so large that his arm could collar the distance before you could get too far away.

You squirmed and struggled in the fat creature’s grasp. Though the hand was soft enough, his grip on you was unbreakable. But you continued trying to force your way to freedom despite the seeming impossibility of it. Your brain wouldn’t send any other commands to your body. It was purely focuse on escape. As you were held in front of the tired lookin glacé the the massive Snorlax, the giant examines the feisty and curiously tiny little human in his hand. Originally he didn’t really care too much about you, but now he was reconsidering this. As your struggling started to die down, you noticed that the Snorlax was starting to move you again.

1532322.content:
The orange dragon glanced through the contents, but didn’t seem to notice you before standing back up. At first you were worried that it was about to abandon you here. But as that thought entered your mind, the bag rocked as you felt it being lifted up. As you started to recover from the initial shock, you suddenly felt a powerful force pushing you down hard. It took you a moment to realize what was happening. Dragonite has grabbed the bag and was now taking flight with it, traveling at incredible speeds back towards its lair. The g force kept you pinned for the entirety of the trip. You couldn’t help but wonder if it would travel this fast if it knew that you were inside the bag it was carrying.

After a few minutes the dragon came to a stop, leaving you at the mercy of inertia as you continued moving, flying forward and out of the opening of the bag. You soon landed on the hard dirt floor of a massive cave. There didn’t seem to be any chambers to this cave besides where this dragon lived. At least not at a first glance. As you slowly got up, you groaned, checking your body for any damage. Thankfully you only had a couple bruises from the ordeal. Not too bad. But it seems the noise you made earlier had finally attracted the creatures attention. Letting out a shocked, feminine-like gasp, the massive dragon drew nearer, its footsteps thundering as the giant stood over you trying to make sense of what she was seeing. As the Dragonite leaned in for a better view, you saw her mouth open as if to speak.

You suddenly feel a bit of humidity coming all around you, confirming your fears. You can see it now, the Flygon opening the sock to see a tiny snack to eat, and gulping you up like your nothing but a grape.

However, instead you feel a shift in gravity, as you feel the sock start to slide out of the bag. You brace for impact as the sock slides completely out of the bag, and falls on the ground with a thump. Inside, you feel a little scrambled, but okay, since the drop wasn't too far.

You go outside your shelter to see what exactly happened. As you step out into the light, you see all of your stuff scattered across the dirt, with no sign of the backpack whatsoever. You turn around to see the Flygon very up close, and with it's head........ stuck in your backpack.

You see the Goodra lick her lips after tasting you. That's not a good sign, you think, as you try to wiggle of the hand's grasp, but as you look down at the ground, you realize that you'd die if you dropped at the height you are at. You look back at the Goodra to see her maw open, ready to take you inside.

The Goodra throws you inside her mouth, as you land on her soft but wet tongue. She then closes her mouth, leaving you in complete darkness. The air around you smells of morning breath and apples, as the Goodra makes a high pitched noise, like she's pleased with your taste. She stops suckling you, as you gasp for air, but you break is short lived, as the Goodra moves your body over to her molars. You brace yourself, expecting for you to crushed by the pearly whites, but instead, you are softly chewed on. It's not enough to cut your skin, but it does feel irritating on you.

You feel the tongue move you back to the center of the mouth as it suckles on you again. It, luckily, doesn't last as long as it did before, but you notice that the tongue starts to go on an incline. You grab onto it, as it tries to lean you over toward its throat. You look down at it, as it swallows a bit of saliva with a big gulp. You gulp yourself, as you realize that you are slipping towards it.

You try to climb up the slick muscle, but the tongue was a bit too slippery. You feel your heart sink, as you see the dark abyss ready for your arrival. You close your eyes, as you feel yourself being...

You bang on the walls of the stomach, wanting an out on this whole mess, but all that gets you is a happy hum from the Goodra, as she lets out a little burp. Knowing that there is no way out of the situation that you are in, you sit down and rest your head on one of the soft stomach walls.

A little while later, you start to notice a weird viscous liquid coming from the walls of the stomach. Your heart sinks, because it could only be one thing, stomach acid. You proceed to bang on the walls some more, begging to be let out, but that causes the Goodra to shake her belly. The world around you vibrates violently, which makes you fall down into a pile of half digested fruit and acid.

That's when you notice...

You then feel a very strong wind come upon you, freezing you the core. The whole interaction with the Goodra made you forget how cold it really was at the moment, but, with the added saliva from the Goodra's lick, You feel like you're freezing to death. The Goodra, luckily, notices as well.

info.brief_description: You find yourself shrunken to a tiny size in the wilderness with wild Pokemon
info.description:
You, a normal male human, go out for a hike when you shrink down to a tiny size, you yourself not a trainer, you encounter wild Pokemon!

Rules
Try not to do one sentence chapters. Try to write something of substance at least. I will delete chapters at my discretion if you fail to meet this outside of choice chapters.

I will allow either being able to understand or not understand the Pokemon, but if you can understand them it's a result of being shrunken down.

I prefer female Pokemon, but I will allow male interaction as well. The pokemon in question are not pokemorphs, they are wild pokemon but have the appropriate sexual organs of their gender.

This interactive allows for any scenario from innocent to sexual, unaware to aware, gentle to violent. Try to keep consistency or if something changes in the dynamic between the human and pokemon interaction, try to justify it.

The main character can change size again, bigger or smaller, and you can explain the circumstances as you wish. He will start at around 2 inches tall.

There can be minimal human interaction, but only in service to the pokemon and tiny main human in the story. Keep the focus there.

Lastly, have fun!

I will be awarding 1000 gift points per substantial chapter added until I run out of gift points.
